bya ba dang/ bde zhes bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang/ bdag ces bya ba dang/ bdag med ces bya ba dang/ zhi zhes bya ba dang/ ma zhi zhes bya ba dang/ yongs su shes par bya ba dang//
yongs su shes par bya bam yin zhes bya ban byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'atshan po' spros pa'o// sdug bsngal yongs su shesapar bya'o zhes bya ban byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa2
chen po'i spros pa'o// kun 'byung spang bar bya'o zhes bya ba dang/ 'gog pamangon du bya'o zhes bya ba dang/ lamabasgom par bya'o zhes bya bani byang chub sems dpa' sems ngang 'tshanapo'i
spros pa'o// pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o zhes bya ban byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'a spres pa'o/ nang stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ban byang chub sems
ngapa'asams dpa'achen po'i sngos pa'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o zhesabya bani bung bsams dpa' sems dpa'achan po'aspres pa'o/ dran pa nye bar
gzhag pa bzhi dang/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang/ dbang po lnga dang/ stobs lnga dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang//
'phags pa'i lam yan lagabargyad ba bsgom par bya'o zhesathubani byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa 'o/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang/ bsam gtan bzhi dang
tshad mad pa bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi deng rnam par thar pa brgyad dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang/ stong pa nyid dang/
mtshanamamed pa dang/ smon pa med padang/ mngon par shes pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang/ gzungs kyi sgo bsgom par bya'o zhes phyab na byang chub sems dpa'asemasadapa'achen po'i spros pa'o//
rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes pa dang mthong bas b.lasatu/ de las 'dza2bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po'i spros pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
'bras bu dang/ phyi'i ma 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ dgra bcom pa dang/ rang byang chubs padang mthong bas bltas taM de las 'da' bar bya'o zhes bya ban byang chub sems dpa'aams dpa'
chen po'i spros pa'o// byang chub sems dba'i sa bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhesabya bani byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par
'jug par bya'o zhes bya ba nibyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// sas rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o zhes bya ba dang/ sems can rnams yongs su smin pas/
bya'o zhes bya ban byang chub sems dpa'asams dpa' chen po'i skyes pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba dang/ ma 'jigs pa bzhi bskyed par bya'o zhes
bya ba dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba dang/ byams pa chen po dang/ snyape dz+dzachen po bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma pa bco
brgyad bskyod par bya'o zhes bya ba nagyi nubasemAngang 'asams dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// rnam pa thams cad makhyan ba nyid thob par bya'o zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen pa'i spros pa'o// bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad yongasasu spang bar bya'o zhes bya ban byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros ba'o//

de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi phurol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs rtag ces bya ba dang/ mi rtag sbra byas mi spro ba 'phro ba yikhyadano//bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba nyes

bya ba dang ) bdag dang bdag med ces bya ba dang/ zhi ba dang ma zhi ba zhes bya ba dang/ yongs sungashag par bya ba dang/ yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin zhes bya bar mi spro ba 'phro bar ma byed do//
tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par nganyis pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya b.ram slob 'bro bar mi byed do// bde ba dang sdug/
shibasngal zhes bya ba dang/ bdag dang bdag med ces bya ba dang/ zhi ba dang ma zhi ba zhes bya ba dang/ yongs su shes bar bya ba dang yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin zhes bya
bar mi spro ba 'phro ba'am byed do// sku mched dang/ khams dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rtag tses bya ba dang/ mi rtag ces bya ba dang/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang
bdag dang bdag med ces bya ba dang/ zhi pho dang ma zhi ba zhes bya ba dang/ yongs su shes par bya ba dang// yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin zhes bya bar mi spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do//
pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rtagaces bya ba dang/ mi rtagaces bya ba dang/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal zhes
bya ba dang/ bdag dang bdag med ces bya ba dang/ zhib dang ma zhi ba zhes bya ba dang/ yongs su shes par bya ba dang/ yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin zhes bya bar a spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do/
'phags pa'i bden pa dang/ bsam gtan dang/ tshad med pa dang/ gzugasamed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ rnam par shar ba brgyad dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu
dang/ stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ teng nge 'dzin dang/ gzungs kyi sgo rnamasabasgomapar bya'o zhes bya bar ma spyi ba 'phro bar mi byed/
do rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dung phyire ma 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang/ rang byang chub shes pa dang mthong bas bltas te
de las 'od 'a par bu'o zhes bya bar ma spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do// byang chub sems dpa' bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes bya bang sngob 'gro bar byed do// byang chub sems pa'i
skyon med par 'jug par bya'o zhes bya bar ma spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do// sos rgyas kyi 'dri yos sudag par bya'o zhes bya ba dang/ bems can rnams yongs su smin par bya'o zhes bya bar ma spro
ba 'phro bar ma byed do// de bzhin gshags pa'i stobs bsu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bskyed par bya'o zhes bya bar ma spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do//

byams pa chen po dang/ snying rje chen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bskyed par bya'o zhes bya bar mi spro ba 'phro ba'am byedado/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya'o

zhes bya bar mi spro ba 'phrobar yibyid do// bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad snang bar bya'o zhes bya bar mi skyo ba 'phro bar ma byedado// de ci'i phore zhin)ngo bo nyidi ni ngogo 'ang 'phro
thurlu// bar ma byed/ dngos po med pa 'ang dngos po med pa 'phro b.raa phying ) ngob chung dang dngos po med pa ma gtogs par chos gzhan gang 'phro bar byed pa 'am/ gang la 'phro bar
byab de lta bu gang yang mad de/ 'ab 'byor de lta bas nagazugasan sbyor med pa'o// tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa ni sbyor med pa'o// skye mched dang//
khams dang/ na cing 'brel bar 'byung bar sIr yod pa'o// pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdunani sngar med pa'o/[/]
'phags pa'ibaden pa dang/ bsam gtan dang/ tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa 'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ rnayu par thar pa dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ stong pa nyid dang/

ma[&]ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ gabrungs kyi sgo rnams ni sbyor med pa'o// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni spyir med pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i

'bras bu dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ dgra bcom pa nyidan ljor med pa'o// rong byang chub n sel+long yod pa'o// byang chub semaMs dpa'i nges rnams ni spro med pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' skyon
yod bani spror med pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dang/ sems can rnams yosasu smin par bya ban sbyor med pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ristobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa dang
0 ]sa sa yang dag par rig pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa bco brgyad nisabyer med pa'o/ )rnam pa thams cad mkhyenapa nyid ni sbe yang ba'o// bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs
pa thams tsang sbrang ban u0f97ra med pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems pa'achan pos ra med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sprad par bya'o// rab 'abyor 'di ltar yang/
gzugs la ngo bo nyidi spyad do/ tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa la ngo bo de da do/ skye mched dang/ khams dang/ na cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la ngo bo de mang dod/
pha rol tu phyin pa zlams cad dang/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs chos sum cu rtsa bdun la ngo bo 'di med do// 'phags pa'ibaden pa dang/ bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang/
gzugs yod pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ rnam par thar pa dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ stong pa nyidi dang/ mtshanamayepa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ mngon pa
shes pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la ngo bo nyid med do/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la ngo bo nyid med do// lanacig phyi'i 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ngang ) phyir mi 'ong ba'i

'bras bu dang/ dgra bcom pa nyeng la ngo bo 'demed do// rang byang chub la ngo bo ri med do// byang chub sems pa'i sa rnams la ngo bo nyidemad do//byang chub saMm dpa'i skyon me da nga la ngo bo nyid ]
@#/ mad do sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dang ) sems can rnams yongs su snyan par bya ba la robo nyade med do// re bzhin gshegs pa'i snyibs bcu dang ) mi 'jigs/

pa dang/ so so yang dag par rag pa dang 3 byams pa chen po drang/ sAng rje chen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyis ma 'dres pa rnams la ngo yo nyidimad do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la ngo bo nyid yod do//
'a gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de la sbyor med pa ste/ rab 'byor de'i phyirten/ gzugs dang/ tsho ba dang/ 'dushes dang 3 'du byed dang ) rnamapar shesapan spyir mdapa'o// mchod dang khams dang/
na cing 'brel par 'byung ban sbyor med pa'o// pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang 3 stong pa nyid thams cad dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams spro med pa'o// pags pa'i bden pa nga/
bsam gtan dang/ tshad med pa dang [？ ]gzugs med pa'i snyims par 'jug pa dang/ rnam par thar pa dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyems par b jug pa dang/ stong pa nyid dang )
mtshan ma med pa dang/ son pa med pa rang mngon par shes pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ gzungs kyi sgon na med pa'i/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bun spyir med pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
'brasabu dud/ phyiram 'o ba' 'brasabu dang dgrabcom pa nyaden sbyorapu'o// rang byang chub na spre'amad pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sa rnams skor med pa'o// byang chub sems
ngapa'i skyonamed pa'i se named pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dang/ sems can yongs su s+sazhe bar bya ba na spyir med pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyobs dang ) ma 'jigs
pa dang so so yang dag par ragi pa dang ) sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnamasan ser med pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyader spyir med pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug go/ gsol pa/ btse ma ldan 'das galate de ltar chos gang la
yang do po nyid dmigs su ma mchisan ) byang chub sems dpa' semasadapa' chen po nyan thos kyi shul tam ) rang sangs rgyas kyi shul tam/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi shul tam/
chos gang ga byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchisabar 'jug par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ba 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyon blos kyi lam gyis
nga chub sems dpa' skyen med par ma 'jug/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam gyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyin med par ma 'jug/ byang chub sems dpalasams pa' chen po na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas kyi lam gyis byang chub sems dpa' skyon med par ma 'jug ga/ rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems pa' sems dpa' chen po na la ma thams cad la bslabs shing/ byang chung be/mas
dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go/ 'dilta ste/ dper na brgyad pa'i chos thams cad la bslabs shing/ yang dag pa'i skyon med par 'jug sku/ nam 'bras bu'i lam ma
ka grub kyi bar du 'bras bu thob par mi byed do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems bab sems dpa' chen po ya lam thams cad bsgrub sa shari/ byang chub salasar pa'i skyon med pa la 'jug ste/

nam rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzan thob par ma gyur kyal du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma byed do// des tang ngo 'dzan de thob ma thag tu skadacig gcigangar ldan pa'i shes rab kyis rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal ted ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shul thams cad yongs su rdzogs par brgyus te/ byang chub
sams dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug par bgyin ) bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar brgyad pa'i shul kyang gzhan/ rgyun du zhugs pa'ashulakyang gzhan/ lan cig phyir bong bar zhugs pa'i
shul kyang gzhan// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'ajishul kyang gzhan[） ]phyir mi 'ong bar zhugs pa'i shul kyang gzhan[） ]pa'am 'ong bad+hishul kyang gzhan/ dgra bcom par zhugs pa'ashel kyang gzhan
dgra bcom pa'ishul kyang gzhan/ rang sangs rgyas su zhugs pa la kyang gzhan ) rang sangs rgyas kya shul kyang gzhan/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgrabcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
a kyi shul kyang gzhan de ) bcom ldan 'das gal tashul de dug gzhan dang gzhanan/ jil byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen pos shul thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyis te/ ) byang chub
sams dpa'i skyon med par 'jugapar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub salas dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shul thams cad yongs su rdzogs par ngagyin/ byang chub sems pa' sems dpa'
chen po de dgabargyud pa'adzIshul bsgra bas shang/ brgyad par ma 'gyur ram ) mthong ba'i shul bsgrubs shing/ rgyun du zhugs paza ma 'gyur2ma ) bsgom pa'ashul bsgrubs gang 'dan cheg gur 'ong
bar zhugs pa 'am/ 'a na cig phyir 'o b.ram 'gyur ram/ phyir mi 'ong bar zhugs pa 'am/ phya'am 'o dba' ma'agyuramadagra bcom par zhugs pa las/ dgra btsem par mi 'gyur ram )
rang sangs rgyas kyi shul bsgrubs shing ) rang sangs rgyas su ma 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni brgyad par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug
pa'i gnas dang skabs ma mchis te ) dazhuganas ma lags so// byang chub semasadapa'i skyon ma mchis par ma rgyud par yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'i gnas ma mchis/
rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang/ lan cag phyir 'o nga ba'i 'bras bu dang/ phyir ma 'ong pa'i 'bras bu dang/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang/ rang byang chub thob nas/ byang chug sams pa'i[}]
skyon mamachis par 'jug pa'i gzhas ma mchis/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa'am chad par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'i gnas mchis
na/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shul thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyis shing/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyonayaachis pajug ba'agyur ba dang/ byang chub sem

ba'i skyon ma mchis par chud nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba dang/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su slong bar 'gyur ba ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor de de bzhin/ de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' nams dpa' chen po brgyad par rgyur de/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
bu thob pa 'am/ lan cig phyi'i 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa 'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'a'abras bu thob pa 'ag/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa 'am/ rang byang chub thob bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon/

tsit+taM mdapar 'jug pa'i gnas dang skabs med de/ de na gnas ma yazheno// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med bar ma chur bar yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyer thob par 'gyur ba'i gegs med do// rab 'khyer len/
kyang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nasemasadang po bskyed pa nas nya bar bzung ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la stod pa'atsho/ shes pa rang mthong bas brgyad las yongs su 'da' sa/

brgyad gang zhe na/dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa dang/ gis kyis dang/ brgyad pa'i sa dang/ mthong ba'i sa dang/ bsrabs pa'i sa dang ) 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang/ byas pa rtogs pa'i sa dang/ rang/

sangs rgyas kyis sta/sa bstan pabargyad po de dag las/ shes ba dang mthong bas 'das nas )lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med ba'ajug go/ byang chub sogs ba'i skyon med pa

zhugaganas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pad kyi kha shas kyi bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'anyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu spong dog khab 'byorade la brgyad pa'i ye shes gang yin pa de yang byang chub sa mas dpa' samA

ba' chapo'i bzod pa// rgyun du zhugs pa'i yang shes dang spong ba'i gshes gang yin ba de yang byang chub sems pa sogs dpa' chen po'i bzod pa// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i lo shos dang sbyong ba gang zhi bde yang

byang chub sems dpa' sems dba' chen po 'a'izod pa phyi'i ma 'ong ba'i shes rang sbyong ba gang yazhi pa de yang byang chub se'ams dpa' sogs dba' chen po'i bzod pa/ dgra bcom pa'i yo shes dang gong ba gang yinaM
ba de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod ba )'ang sangs rgyas kyis shes dang slong bgang lam de yang byang chub sags bsams dpa' chenapo' bzed ba chen po ste/ de ltabasan byung
chub sems dpa' sas sa ba 'a chen po ni nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam yongs su rdzogs pa'i byas shing las kyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi la shes kyis byang chub so tshas dpa'i skyon
pyad dmad par 'jug go/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyabag chags kyamatshams sbyor ba'i nyin mongs pa thams cad rab tu stong ngo//
rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngonapar rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing/
a bras bu ltar soms tan thams cad kyi nya ba la 'tshol bar 'gyur ro/// shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa dzamabubazha pa/bam po re gsum pa/
gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das gang nyan thos kyashul dang deng sangs rgyas kyashul dang )sangs rgyas kyashulade dag las lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi shul gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

[” ]sul pa/ ) rab 'byor khyodachub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyidarnam par dag par bsgrub par bya ste/ de la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par dag pa na rnam pa gang dang/ tshul/

zla gang dang/ mtshanam gang dang gang gas lam dubarjod pa'i rnam pa de dag dang/ tshul de dag dang/ mtshan ma de dag byang chub sems pa'i sams dpa' chen pos mngon pa rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba dang/
mtshon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ canas kyang gzhan gyis shesal 'gyur ba dang/ gzhan gal ba'i don du gzhan la brjodapa dang/ bstan pa dang/ bshad pa dang ) gdags pa dang//

ma/ rnam par dgod pa lta/ de la khyad chugasems dpa' semasadapa' chen pos sgrub na lta bu r shes par bya ba'i don du/ sgraskad dang bsdur bya ba gang gas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su ge bar
'gyur ba lta bu'i sgra skad dang/ brdathams cad brjod par khya/ yongs sugazung bar bya sta/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang byang chub sems pa'asams dpa'achan pos lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs
ba'abudog/ lag thams cad shes pa nyade yongs su rdzogs par byas nas// sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa rig par bya sta) sams can dmyal ba pa'i sems nyan rnams kyis/sa can rnams dmyalal
ba'i lag shes par bya'o// rgyu shes par bya'o// 'bras bu shes pa bya'o// des kyang sems can dmyal ba'alam las bzlog par bya ste/ rgyu las kyang bzlog par byago/ 'bras bu las kyang bzlog bar
bya'o// byol song gi skyo gnas kyi sems can rnams kyakhyol song ga sa gnas kyi lam shes par bya'o// rgyu shes par bya'o// 'bras bu shes par bya'o/ des kyang byol song gi skyo gnas kyalam lasabazlog
bar bya ste/ rgyu las kyang bzlog par bya'o// 'bras bu las kyang bzlog par byago/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams kyigaweN+Dab 'jig rten gyi lam shes par bya'o/ rgyu shes bar bya'o//
'grwa sa lugs par bya'o// des kyang gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam bzlog par byas/ rgyulas kyang bzlog par phyago// 'brasabu las kyang bzlog par bya'o// ma 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/
)klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ ming/ lha dang/ tshangs pa rnams kyi lam shes par bya'o// rgyu shes par bya'o// 'bras bu shes par bya'o// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams dang//
ngag rgyas kyi lha rnams dang/ 'bras bu cha ba'i lha rnams dang/ 'du shes med pa' sems can rnams dang/ mi chab 'i lha rnams dang/ ma gdung ba'i lha rnams rang/ shan tumathong ba'i
'a lha rnams dang/ gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams dang/ 'og man gyi lha rnams kyi lam shesaparabya'o// rgyu shes par bya'o// 'bras bu shes par bya// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha
rnams dang/ rnam shes mtha' yas skya mchod kyi lha rnams dang/ cung zad mdapa' skye mched kyi lha rnams dang ) 'du shes med 'du shes gdaman skya mchod kyi lha rnams kyi lam shes par

bya'o rgyu shes par bya'o// 'bras bu shes par bya'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ba'ashes par bya'o// yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi deng ) dbang po lta dang/ stobs lnga dang/
[/ ]byang chub kyi yin lag bdun dang ) 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shes par bya'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang/ bsam gtan bzhi dang/ tshad med pa bzhi ngang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
'jug pa khazhar ) rnam par thar pa brgyad dang/ mthar rgyas gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu shes par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ ma 'jigs pa bzhi deng ) so so yang dag par rig pa

0u0f10bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang/ byamasal chen po dang/ sAng rje chen po shesapar bya'o// lam de dag gis kyang sems can gang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dwagod par bya ba de dag

rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'brasaru la dgod )gang lan cagatsare'ong ba'a'i bras bu la dgod par byakhade dag na lan cig phyi'i 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod/ gang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par byab de dgan phyir

ma 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod/ gang dag bcom pa nyid la dgod par byabar dgan rigra bcom panyade la dgod/ gapard byang chub la dgod par bya ba de dgan rang byang chub la dgod/gang byang chung la dged par bya ba de dag
ni'ung chub la dgod do// rab 'byor 'di'i@#nga chub sems pa'i sems dpa' chen po'i lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do// de dag la bslabs shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams kyi
bsam pa la'ajugago/ sems can rnams kyi bsam pa la zhugs nas/ de bzhin du chos ston to// des chosaston pa de yang 'bras bu med par ma 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhen/ den 'ang ltar des gzhan gyarebang
kho shashi tu shes bar byas pa'i phyir ta/ de nasaMms can rnams kyi lam dang/ lam sa yin pa dang ) 'chi'il pa dang/ skyo ba yang rab tu shes so// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'ams dpa' chen pos shes

ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyad par bya ste/ gas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa darin byang chub kyi phyogs gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya ba 'am//nyan thos kyis bslab par bya ba
'amarang sangs rgyas kyis bslab par bya ba'i chos thams cad gang yang ma 'dus pa med de/ gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
ka chos rnams gang lags pa dang/ byang cha ba gang lags pa'i chos de dag thams cad ldan pa'ang ma lags/ ma ldan pa'ang ma lags/ gzugs ma mchis pa/ bstan du ma mchis pa/thogs pa ma mchis
kha bsta 'di ltar mtshan nyidam mchis par mtshan nyid gcig no/ ji ltar byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams byang chub tu bsgrub par 'gyur ba lags/bcom ldan 'das ldan pa'ang ma 'gas/maldan pa la
ma lags 1 gzug ma mchis shang/ bstan du ma mchis/ thogs pa ma mchis pa 'di ltar mtshan nyid ma mchis par mtshan nyer gcigapan chos gang la yang bsgrub pa 'am/'jig par brgyad pa ma mchis
so bcom ldan 'das 'di lta sta/ den nam mkha' na chos gang la yang bsgrub pa 'am/ 'jig par ma bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du rang gamtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos gang la yang bsgrub pa 'am/
'jig par bgyid pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhazhe'o// de de bzhazhe ta/ rang gamtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos ni chos gang la yang bsgrub pa 'am/

'jig par byed pamed do// rab 'byor sems can gang rang ga mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos ma shes pa de dgag don du'ang skad du/ 'du deg na byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos byang chub thob par byed pa'i zhes
bshadakyi/ rab 'byord na 'od ltar gzugs gang yin pa dang/ tshor ba dang ) 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang/ sku mched dang/ khams dar/ rten cing 'brel par/

'byung ba gang yazhi pa dang )sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yazhi pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa der ]btson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan rgya

pha rol tuphyan pa dar shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa gang yin pa dang/ nang stong pa nyide gang yan pa dang/ phyi stong pa de gang yin pa dang/ phyi nang stong pa nyid gang yazhi pa dang/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
bar du gang yazhi pa dang/ bsam gtan dang po gang yin pa dang ) bsam gtan gnyis pa dang ) bsam gtan gsum pa dang/ bsam gtan bzha pa gang yin pa dang/ byams pa gang yin pa dang//
sang rdzudang/ dga' kha dang/ btang snyoms gang yin pa dang/ nam mkha'amatha' yas skya mchod kyi ny+nyoms par 'jug pa gang yazhi pa dang/ rnam shes mtha' yasasku mchod kyi snyoms par 'jug
ba dang/ cung zad med pa 'a spyi gcod kyi somasapar 'jug pa dang/ 'du shes med 'du shes med ma'i skyamachod kyi snyoms par 'jug pa gang yan pa dang/ dran panye bar gzhago ba gang yin pa dang/
ya nga dag par song ba dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang ) dbang po dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag kha rgyud pa gang yin pa
[/g ]/'phags pa'i bden pa dang/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyar dang ) mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang/ tang de
'dzan rnams dang/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams gang yin pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dar/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi deng/ sangs rgyas
kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang// byams pa chen po dang ) sange rje chen po gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gang yin pa'i chos de rag tham41 cang chos dang 'dul
ba 'di la ldan ba yang ma yazhi ) ma ldan pa yang ma yin/ gzugs med pa// bstan du med pa// thogs pa med pa sta/ 'daltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig kyang ) de dag de bzhade
gshegs pas sams can rnams gzung bar bya ba'i don du/ 'jig rten gyaze sAd kyis de skad du brjod du/ don dam par na me yin no// de dag thams cad la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
ka pos shes pa dang mthong bas bsgrub par bya ste/ ji lta ba bzhan du shes pa dang mthong bas bslabasanas/ chos la lan man du bya// chos la lan me don du ga bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen pos/ chos ganganashis pa dang mthong bas bslabs te mngon du bya ) chos gang mngon dum bye zhe na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams neshes pa rang mthong bas bslabs
ta mngon du ma bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngen du bya ste/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bsags/
pa'i chos dang/ 'dul ba shes rab kyapha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i chos dang 'dul ba 'phags pa'i chos dang 'dul ba zhesabagyi
bde ji tsam rgyas na/ 'phags pa chos dang 'dul ba zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'a da le nyan thos rnams dang/ rang sas rgyas rnams dang )
byang chub sems dpa' sam sa dpa' chen po rnamasadang ) de bzhin gshegs pa dgrabcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ 'dod chags dang ldan pa yang ma yazhi/
bral ba yangs yin/ zhe sdang dang ldan pa yang ma yaste/ bral ba yang ma yane gti mug dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ bral ba yang ma yin/ 'jig tshogs su lta ba dang ldan pa yang m
lan bral ba yang ma yin te thatsom dang ldan pa yang g.yon ) bralakha yang ma yin/ tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs bsnyams pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ bral ba yang ma yazhi )
'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang gnod sems dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ bral ba yang ma lan/ gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ bral ba yang ma yin/
ma rig pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ bral ba yang ma yazhi 2 nga rgyal dang rgod pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ bral ba yang ma yin/ bsam gtan dang po dang ldan pa yang ma yun/
bral ba yang ma yon ) bsam gtan gany+dzis pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ bralab yang ma yin ) bsam gtan gsum pa dang ldan pa ma yani/ bral ba yang ma yin/ bsam gtan bzhi pa/
dang ldan pa yang ma yani/ bral kho yang ma yin// byams pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ bral ba yang ma yin/ sang rjodang ldan pa yang ma yin ) bral pa yang ma ya2) dga' ba dang ldan pa yang
ma yi ) bral ba yang ma yazhi ) btang snyoms dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ bral ba yang ma yani/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skya mchod la snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ bral ba yang ma
'i rnam shes mtha' yas skya mched la snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ 'du shes med 'dushes med ma'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldan

ba lang ma yin/ bral ba yang ma yazhe/ dran pa nye bar gzhagapa dang/ yang dag par song ba dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang )dang nga po dang/ stobs dang byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yin
lag brgyad pa dad ldan pa yang ma yani/ bral ba yang ma yani// 'phags pa'i bden pa dang/ bsam gtan dang/ tshad med pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ rnam par thar pa dang/

mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ rnam par tharapa' sgo stong pa nyid dang )mtshan ma mang pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ ting nge 'dzanye dang/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang ldan
pa yang ma yin/ bral ba yang ma ya/ ! de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang ma 'jigs pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa dang sangs rgyas kyis ma 'dres pa bcobargyad dang/ byams pa chen po
dang sAng rje chen po dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ bral ba yang ma yin/ 'dusakhrus kyi khams dang ) 'dus ma byas kyi khams dang ldan pa yang ma ya bralakhayang ma yazhe pas ) deb phyi'i de dag 'phags
pa zhes bya sa/ 'di na de dag gachos dang 'dul pa la'i bas 3 pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i chos dang 'dul ba zhes khya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ don 'ang ltar chos de dag thams cad gzugs med pa// bstan du
mad pa// thogs pa med pa/ 'di ltar mtshan nyide med par mtshan nyid gcig pa sku/ de dgan gzugs med pa dang gzugs med par ldan pa yang ma An bral ba yang ma yin no// bstan du/
mad pa dang bstan du med par yang ldan pa yang ma yan ) bral ba yang ma yazhi'o// thogs pa med pa dang thogs pa med par yang ldan pa yang ma yani/ bral ba yang ma yan no// mtshan nyid
mad pa dang mtshan nyid med par ldan pa yang ma yAn/ bral kha yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gzugs med pa/
ga/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sku/ de la byang chub segs dpal bams dpa' chen pos
bslab par bya'o// des de la bslabs na chos kyi mtshan nyid gang yang dmakas par ma shegyur ro// kab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na gzugs kyi mtshan nyade la
'gro bslab par mi brgya 'am/ tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par ma brgya 'am/ skyamached dang/ khams dang/ rtan cing 'brel

bar 'byang ba'i mtshan nyide la bslab par ma bgyi 'o// sprin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par ma brgya 'am ) tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu pa'i pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/
brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi parol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par ma brgya 'om nang stong pa nyid kyamtshan nyid la bslab
par ma brgya 'am/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi mtshan nyide labaslabapar ma bgyi nam/ bsam gtan dang po 'a michen nyid la bslab par ma brgya 'am/ bsam gtan gnyis pa dang/
[”]bsam gtan gsum pa dang/ bsam gtan bzhipa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ byams pa chen po'i mtshan nyid la bslab par ma bgyi 'am/ sAng rjen po dang/ dga' ba chen po dang/
btang snyoms chen po'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi brgya 'am/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skya mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ rnam shes mtha' yas sku mched kyi sems par 'jug pa dang/
cung dmed pa'i spyi mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ 'du shes med 'du shes med man skyamached kyi sems par 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par ma bgya'am/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi
mtshan nyidel bslab par mkhergya ma/ yang dag par spong ba dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang/ dbang po dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kya yan lag dang/ 'phags pa'i 'o na yan lag brgyad pa'i mtshan
nyid la bslab par ma bgyi bas/stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ sonapa med pa'i ting nge 'dzani dang rnam par thar pa dang ! mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang mngon par shes pa
dang: ting nge 'dzin dang/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyamtshan nyade la bslab par ma bgyi 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang/ ma 'jigs pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi tshes
'dres pa bco brgyud kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par ma brgya 'ag)byams pa chen po dang/ sAre rje chen po'i mtshan nyide la bslab par ma brgya 'am/sdug bsngal 'phags pa' 'dzin pa'atshan nyid la bslab
par ma bgyi'om ) kun 'byung dang/ 'gog pa dang/ lam 'phags pa'i bden pa'i mtshan nyade la bslab par ma brgya 'am/ rten cing 'brelapa 'byung ba lugs dang mthun pa dang lugs dang ma mthun/
[f]@#/ pa'amtshan nyid la bslab par ma gya 'am/ 'dus byas kyi khams kyi mtshan nyide la bslab par ma brgya 'am/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyimtshan nyid la bslab par ma brgya 'am//
[!/ ]ba com ldan 'das ga la te chos 'di dag gi mtshan nyid la bslab ma'agazhi/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid dang/ 'du byed kyi
mtshan nyid la bslabs te// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis las 'da' bar 'gyur/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi se las ma 'das na/ ji ltar byang chub sems pa'i skyon mamachis pa la 'jug
par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la ma zhugs na/ ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pachid ma thoban/ ji ltar chos kyi 'khor lo bso
bar bgyi/ chos kyi rtse khor lo ma bskor na/ jiltar nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyatheg pa 'am// theg pa chen pos sems can rnams 'khor ba lus ngagol bar bgyid ga cem
ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa// rab 'byor gal tachos la la zhig la ga na nyid yong na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'asas dpa' chen pos mtshan nyide de la bslab par 'gyusan sa de thagasacad la mchin

nyid gdapa gzugs med pa// bstan du med// thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid yod par mtshan nyid )cig pasan/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' semasadapa' chen pos mtshan nyid la yang bslab par mkhye/

yatshan nyidemadapa la yang bslab pa'amaN+Dago// de ci'i phyir zhe na: slan chadamtshan nyid yod par gyur pa 'gaphyis mtshan nyid yod par rgyu kho ma yazhigyi/ rab 'byor ches 'du degan slan chad kyang mtshan nyid yod la[7]
ngaltar 5mtshamanyid med pasan/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan nyid yod pa la yang bslab par mi bye/ mtshan nyid med pa la yang bslab par ma bu'i pan+ti lta 3/ de yawan
gachags pa rnams byung yang rung/ de bzhin gshegasapa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ mtshan nyid med pa'i dbyanges den po bzhin du gnas pa'o// gsolapa/ bcom ldan 'dasagal tedir chos thams cad
la mtshan nyid ma mchis shing/ mtshan nyid tha dad pa'ang ma lags ) mtshan nyer gcig pa yang ma lags n/ de ji ltarabyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchis par
'a gyur bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgomapa mchis par na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos nyanazlosakya sa 'am/ nad sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da'
bar gnyis so// nyan thos kyis nam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las ma 'dasapa naM/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen pos byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug par
zhus so/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par ma zhugs par// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ma skyoba' chos la bzod pa bskyod par shes so/[”]ma skyo ba'i chos la bzong
bam skyas bar mngon par shes pa bsgrub pa ma nus so// byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pa ma bsgrubs par n/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyil dang//
sams can longs su smin par bgyi beram nus so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang/ sogs can yongs su sman par ma bgyis bar na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mnyes so//
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma bgyis par na/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mazhus so// chos kya'i khor lo mal skor ba'an/ samasacan rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par zhus
so lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras khu dad ) phyir ma 'ong pa'a'abras bu dang/ dgra bcom pa nyade la dgod b.ram nus so// rang byang chub la dgodapar ma nus so/// khan med pa yang dgapar rdzogs pa'i
byang chub la dgod par mnyes so// nyams can rnams sbyin pa lasabyung ba'akhasod nams brgyaba'adengos po la dgod par mnyes so// tshul khrames las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po dang//
bsgom pa lasazungaba' bsod zhams bgyi ba'i dngos po la dgod pa'i mnyes so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sul pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhazhe na/ de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor chos thams cad
ni mtshan nyid med pa sta ) mtshan nyid tha dad pa yang ma yin/ mtshan nyid gcag pa yang ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos thams cad mtshan
tidam mchasin/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba labasgom par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'o sa kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa lakhasgom pa na/ mtshan nyid tha dad pa yang ma yazhi/ mtshan tare gcig pa yang ma yin te/ rab 'byor mtshan 1de med par bsgom pa na/ byang chub sems[– ; ]nye sa dpa' chen
bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// ga sol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ji ltartan mtshan nyid ma mchis pa bsgom shes rab kya la rol tu phyin pa bsgom par 'gyur[<]tsam ldan 'das kyis/
bka' susprul pa/ chos thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de ji ltar chos thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom ban )
shes rab kyil rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ bcom ldan 'dasakyisabaka' sal pa/ gzugs rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pan/ shesarab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'i/ tshor ba dang 'du shos
ra 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgomapan/ shes rab kyapha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// mag rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni// shes rab kyi pe rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//
rnab dang )sna dang lce dang/ lus dang yade rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pabasgom pa'o// gzugs rnam par bsgom pa sgom ban/ shes rab kyalertsol bya'i skom pa'o
@#/ sgra dang 'dradang )'o dang/ rigadang/ chos rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgomapa'o// mag gzem par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'i// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang/ sna'i rnam par ngashes pa dang/ lce'i rnam par shes pa dang/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa par/ mde kya rnam par shes pa
tsa/ rnam par bsgom pa bsgos pa// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'i// mgag 'dus te regapa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pan/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// na ba' 'dus te reg
ba dang/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang/ lcel 'dus te reg pa dang/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//
mig ga'i dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa na/ shes rab kyi pha ro' tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// zla ba' 'dus te reg par skyon gyis tshor ba dang/ sbag 'dus te reg pa'i skyon

gyis tshar ba dang/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsho'ab dang/ lus kyi ba dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang ) yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa khasgom pan/ gnas
kyal rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// sa' khams rnam par bsgom bakhasgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// chu'i khams dang/ de la khamasar// rgyud ga khamasard/ namamakha'i
khams dang/ rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pan/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rten cing 'brel par 'bung ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa na// shes rab kya
ba rol tu phyin par sgom pa'o// ma rige ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi khe rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa dang )mang dang gzugs dang/ sku mched
gdang/ reg pa dang/ tshor ba dang/ srid pa dang/ len pa dang/ sAdapa dang/ skya ba dang/ rga sharnam par bsgom pa bsgom pan/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// blangab rnam pa bsgom
babasgom pa na ) shes rab kyapha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// don brlag bar bsgom pa bsgom pa na )shes rab kyapha rol tu phyin pabasgom pa'o// bsam gtan dang po rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ bsam gtan gnyis pa dang/ bsam gtan gsum pa dang/ bsam gtan bzha ba rnam pa bsgom pa bsgom pan/ shes rab kya ba'og
du phyin pa bsgog pa'o// byams pa rnam par bsgog pa bsgom pa na) shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// snyade rje dang dga' ba dang/ btang snyoms rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa na/shes rab kyal/
sol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// nam mkha' mtha' yas gad kyi snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pan )shes rab kyi le 'ol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi
)snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyogs par 'jug pa dang du shes med 'du shes med mnoskye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa
ra bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// sangs rgyas rjes sun+dan pa rnam par bsgom pabasgom pan) shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// sarjes su dran pa dang/ dge 'dun

rjes su dran pa dang/ tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang/ gtong ba rtas su dran pa dang/ lha rjes su dran pa dang/ skyo brjes su dran pa dang/ dbugs phyin nga du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang/ 'chibe rjes su dran pa dang/

lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran po rnam par bsgom babasgom pan/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// ma rtagapa' 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pan )shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o
sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes dang/ bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang/ ma sngog pa'i 'du shes dang/ dngos po med pa' 'du shes dang brtag ga'i phushes dang/ sems can gyi 'du shes dang/ srog ga 'du
shos dang/ skye ba'a'adu shes dang/ gso ba' 'du shes dang/ skyes bu'a'adu shes dang/ gang zag ga 'du shes dang/ shed can gyi 'du shes dang/ sheng bdag gi 'du shes dang/ byed pa po'i 'du shes
dang/ tshorab po'i 'du shes dang/ shes pa po'i 'du shes dang/ mthong pa po'i 'du shes rnam par bsgomab bsgomalan/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rtag pa'i 'du shes rnam par
khasgom pa bsgom pa na/ shes ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// bad ba' 'dushes dang/ sdug pa'i 'dushes dang/ bdag gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom par ]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom/
pa'o/zhapa nya bar gzhag pa rnam par bsgom pa khasgom pan/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// yang dag par spong ba dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang/ dbang po dang/ stobs dang da
byang chub kyayan lag dang lamarnam par bsgomapa bsgom pa// shes rab kyapha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa na/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rnam par thar ba brgyad dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
pa'o rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rtog pa med cing spyod pa med pa'i tid de 'dzan rnam pa bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pabasgom pa'o/
gal med cing dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzani rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyapha rol tuphyin pa bsgom pa'o// sdug bsngal 'phags pa'ibaden pa rnamapar bsgom pa bsgom pa/) shes rab kyi pa
'ol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// kun 'byung 'phags pa'i khe na pa dang/ 'gog pa 'phags pa'aparten pa dang/ lam 'phag sa khaM' bden pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa3 ) shes 'ab kyi pha re 2tu phyin pa
bsgomapa'o// sdug bsngal shes pa dang kun 'byung shes pa dang/ 'geg pa shes pa dang/ lam shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rolaMtu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//
kazang pa shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa 1shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa bsgom pa'o// maslob shes pa dang/ chos shes pa dang/ rjes su 'grog shes pa dang/ kun rdzob shes pa dang
'a dra ba shes pa dang/ gru jabazhane shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa na) shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa na ) shesab kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ) bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ) shes rab
kyawarol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// nang stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ phyisnyen

ba nyid dang/ phyizhing stong pa nyid dang/ dngos po yod pa'i ngo khe nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du zlum par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// mngon par shes pa drug rnam par
bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyal rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// ting nge 'a zhi thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pan/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pabasgom pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo thams cad

rnam par basgom kha bsgom pa na/ shes rab kyi ye rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// de bzhin gshags pa'i stegs bcu dang/ ma 'o jagis pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi deng/ sangs rgyas kyi chosam
'dres pa bco brgyad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pan )shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// byams pa chen po dang// pirje chen po rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pan ) shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
bsgom pa'o// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'brasakhu rnam par bsgom pabasgom pan/ shes rab kyi pha rol phyan pabasgom pa'o// lanag phyir 'ong ba' 'brasabu dang )pa'i ma 'ong nga' 'bras bu dang/ dag
bcom pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// na byang chub rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa3 )shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ 2rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi b.rangu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom bko/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs parnam par bsgom pa
bsgom pan/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na gzugs rnam par bsgom pab sgom pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol

tuphyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltaran tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ deshes rab kyapha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na skya mched dang/
thi/ @#// khams dang// cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnam par bsgom ba ba sgom pan/ shas ga kyal rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags ) rna ltaganang ba dang dor ba rnam par bsgom la//
bsgom pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom ba lags )ja ltar na bsam gtan dang po dang/ bsam gtan gnyis pa dang/ bsam gtan gsum pa dang/ bsam gtan bzhi pa dang/
byams pa dang/ snying rje dang ) dga' ba dang/ btang snyoms dang/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi sems par 'jug pa dang/
cung zad med pa'i skyo mched kyi sems par 'jug pa dang ) 'dushes med 'du shes medaa ne skyon chad kyi snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyan pa bsgom pa lag
ji ltar na sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang/ chos rjes su dran pa dang/ dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang/ tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang/ gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang/ lharjes su dran pa dang/
skyob rjes su dran pa rang/ dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang ) 'chi ba rjes sudran pa dang/ lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom ba bsgom pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa bsgom pa lags ) jaltar na ma rtag pa'i 'du shes dang ) sdugakhasngal ba'i 'du shes dang/ bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang ) mi sdug pa'i 'du shes dang/ dngos po
0 (med pa'i 'du shes dang/ bdag ga 'du shes dang/ sams can gyi 'du shes dang/ srog ga 'du shes dang/ skya ba' 'du shes dang/ gso ba' 'du shes dang/ rgyus bar 'du shes dang
gang zagag 'dushes dang/ shed can gyi 'du shes dang/ shed bdag gi 'du shes dang/ byed pa po'i 'dushes dang/ tshor ba po'i 'du shes dang shes pa po'i 'du shes dang/ mthong pa po' 'du
shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pas/ shes rab kyaye rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rtag pa'i 'du shes dang/ bde ba' 'dushes dang/ stag pa'i 'du shes dang/ bdagag 'dushes
rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ jaltar 'byang chub kya phyogs kyi rjes rnams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/
bsgom pa lags/ dzi ra na stong pa nyid drang 1 mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa'i ting ngo 'dzin dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zlum par bsgom

pakhasgom pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ja ltar na rtog pa dang bcasu dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzazhi dang/ rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang/ rtog pa med cing dpyod/
pa med pa'i de ngo 'a dzan rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ nyes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na sdug sngal 'phags pa'i rin pa dang// kun 'byung 'phags
ba' brten pa dang/ 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa dang/ lam 'phags pa'i bden pa dang/ sdugabasngal shes pa dang/ kun 'byung shes pa dang/ 'gog pa shes pa dang/
'am shes pa dang zad pa shes pa dang/ ma skye ba shes pa dang/ chos shes pa dang/ rjes su 'gro ba shes pa dang/ kun rdzob shes pa dang/ 'dris pa shes pa dang/ sgra jabazhin shes pa rnam par
'tsho bsgom pakhasgom pa ni/ shes rab kupha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na pha rol tu lun pa thams cad rang/ stong pa nyid thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa// shes rab kyile kol
phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na mdon par shes pa drug dang/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ ma 'jigs pa bzhi
dang/ so so yang dag par 'gapa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang/ byams pa chen po dang/ sAng rje chen po rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
bsgog pa lags/ ji ltar na rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'brasabudang/ lan cigaphyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ phyi'i ma 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ dkrabcom pa nyid dang/ 'du byang chubu dang/ rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang/ ji ltar na bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad sbyang brnag par bsgom pa bsgom pa na// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags//
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'ad la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la srid pa'i tsho/ gzugs dngos po yod ces bya bar ma sgom mo//
tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang ) 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa dngos po red ces khyabar ma skyes mo// sku mched dang/ khams dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo/
blab dang rab dngos po yod ces bya ba'am sgom mo// bsam gtan dang po dang/ bsam gtan gnyis pa dang/ bsam gtan gsum pa dang/ bsam gtan bzhi ba dang/ byams pa dang/ snyadi dang/
dga' ba dang/ btang snyoms dang ) nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi sems par 'jugapa dang/ cung zad med pa'i spyi mchod kyi sems

par 'jug pa dang/ 'du shes med 'du shes med mni skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dngos po lo daces bya ba'am sgomamo// sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang/ chos rjes su dran pa dang/ dge 'dun rjes su dran

pa dar tshul khrims rjes su napa dang/ gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang/ lharjes su dran pa dang/ skye ba rjes su dran pa dang ) dbugs phyi zheng du rgyu ba rjes su dran padang ) 'ayi rjes su dran pa dang/ lus kyi
rnam pa rjes su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar yo sgom mo// ma rtag pa'i 'du shes dang/ sdugabasngal gyi 'du shes dang/ bdagamed pa'i 'du shes dang ) ma sdugapa'i 'du shes dang ) dngos
bo med pa'a'adushes dang/ bdagag 'dushes dang )sams can gyi 'du shes dang/ srog gshedu shes dang )skyabang 'dushes dang/ gsoba' 'du shes dang/ skyas bu'a'i dushes/
dang gang zag ga 'du shes dang/ shed can gyi 'i dushes dang/ shadab dgag 'dushes dang/ byedapa kho'i 'i du shes dang/ tshob bo'i 'du shes dang/ shes pa po'i 'du shes dang/ mthong ba po la kedu
shes dngos po yod ces byugar gi sgom mo// rtag pa'i du shes dang/ bde ba' 'du shes dang/ sdug pa' 'du shes dang/ bdag gi 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya ba ra ma sgum mo// byang chub kyi phyogs
kyichos rnams dngos po yod cas byabar ma sgom mo// stong pa nyid dang/ mtshanam mad pa dang/ son pa mdapa' ting nge 'dzin dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par

N+NaM 'jug pa dgu dngos po yod ces bya bar ma sgom mo// rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang pacas pa'i ting nge 'dzani dang ) rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang/ rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting
nga bzhi ngas bo yod ces bya bar ma sgom mo/ sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i ben par/ kun 'byung 'phags pa'i bden pa dang/ 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa dang/ lam 'phags pa'i
ban btang/ sdug bsngal shes pa dang/ kun 'byungashes pa dang/ 'gog pa shes pa dang/ lam shes pa dang/ zad pa shes pa dang ma skye ba shes pa dang/ chos
shes ba dang/ rjes su 'gro ba zhes pa nga/ kun rdzob shes pa dang/ 'dris pa shes pa dang/ sgra ji bzhin shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar ma sgom mo// pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang/ stong
yanyid thams cad dngos bo lod ces bya ba'am sgom mo// mngon par shes pa drug dang/ ring 'dzan thams cad dang/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang/ de bzhin gshegs ba'i stobs bcu dang/ [”]

ga ge jag ba bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzha deng/ sangs rgyas kyi chos pa 'dres pa bco brgyad dang/ byams pa chen po dang/ sAng rje chen bo dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// rgyun du zhugs

ba'i 'brasa'u dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ phyigami 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ dgrabcom pa nyid dang rang byang chub dang kham pa thamathad mkhyen pa de kya reradang/ bag chags kyisotshags sbyor ba'i ten mongs pa

thams cad sbyang ba dngos po yod ces bya ba'am sgrim mo// de tsa'iphyir zhen/ rab 'byoradangos po'i 'du shes can la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinub sgom pa med do/ dngos po'i 'du shes can la bsam gtan

gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa med do// dngos
bo'i 'dushes can la bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba'i bar du med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dngos po la 'dazhi bdag go zhes byabar mtha' gnyis la
chags te/sbyin pa dang/ tshul khrims dang/ bzod pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ bsam gtand/ shes rab dang/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams
cad sang ba'i bar la 'di ni bdag go zhesabya bar mtha' gnyis la chags bar gyur pas/ gang mtha' gnyis la chags par gyur ba de lanazer bkod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dngos po' 'du shes can
lan sbyin pa yang med tshul khrims kyaed/ bzod pa'ang yod/ brtson 'grus kyang sher/ bsam gtan yang ched/ shes rab kyang med/ bag chags kyi 'tshams sbyor ba'i nyen mongs ba thams
cad spang ba'i bar du yang yongasasu shes pa medan/ de thar par gyur ba ltag la yod/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dngos po mchis zhes brgya ban ci lags/ dngos po ma mchis shes brgyab na ci
lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' salal/ rab 'byor gnyison dngos bo bod pa'o/ dmaganyis pa zhi dngos po med pa 'o// gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das gnyes shes bgyi
ba ji ltabu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sul pa// rab 'byor gzugs kyi 'du shes na gnyis so// tshor ba dang// 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes gnyis so// skya mched
dang/ khams dang/ acade 'bral bar 'byung ba' 'du shosan gnyis so// blang b.rang ngor ba'i 'du shes naganyis so// bsam gtan dang po dang bsam gtan gnyis pa dang bsam gtan gsum
0ba dang bsam gtan bzhi pa dang/ byams pa dang/ dga' ba dang/ btang snyoms dang kam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyems par
'gakha dad cung zad med pa'i mchod kyi snyomasabar 'jug pa dang/ 'du shes med 'dushes med man skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i du shes na gnyis so// sangs rgyas rjes su dran par b
chos rjes su dran pa dang/ dge 'dun rjes su dren pa dang tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang 3 gtong brjes su dran pa dang/ lha rjes su dran pa dang skye ba rjes su dran pa dang/ dbugs phyi nang
durgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang/ 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang/ lus kyi rnamapa rjes su dran pa'i 'dushesazhiganyis so// ma rtag pa'i 'du shes dad sdugakhasngal ba' 'du shes dang/ bdag med
pa'i 'du shes dang ) mi sdug pa'i 'du shes dang/ ngos po med pa'i 'du shes dang/ bdag gi 'du shes dang/ sems can gyi 'dushes dang/ srog gi 'du shes dang/ skya ba'i 'du shes ngang
gsokha' 'du shes dang/ skyasabu'i 'du shes dang/ gang zag ga 'ashes dang/ shed can gyi 'du shes dang/ shed bdag gar du shes dang )byed ba po'i 'du shes dang/ tshor ba po'i
'du shes dang/ shes pa po'i 'du shes dang/ mthong ba po'i 'dunasanaganyis so// rtag pa'i 'du shes dang/ bde ba'i 'du shes dang/ sdug pa'i 'du shes dang/ bdag ga 'du/
@#/ she sanaganyis so// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi 'du shes gnyis so// stong ba nyid dang ) mtshan ma med pa dang/ son ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzazhi dang/ rnam par
thar pa brgyad dang/ mthar gyis gnasaba' snyoms par 'jug pa dgu' 'du shes ni gnyis so// rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod padar bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzan dang/ rtog bamed la dpyod tsam gyi ting nga
'dzani dang/ rtog pa me dacing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dang/ kun 'byung 'phags pa'i bden pa dang/ 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden
ba dang lam 'phags pa'ibaden pa dang/ sdug bsngal shes pa dang/ kun 'byung shes pa dang/ 'gog pa shes pa dang/ lam shesapa dang/ zad pa shes pa rar ) ma sbyo ba shes pa dang//
chos shes pa dang/ rjes su 'grob shes pa dang/ kun rdzob shes pa dang/ 'dris pa shes pa dang/ sgra jabazhin shes pa'i 'du shes gnyis so// pha rol tu phyan pa thams cad dang/ stong pa nyid thams
cad kyi 'du shes na gnyis so// mngon par shes pa drug dang ) tarenge 'dzazhi thams cad dang/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang )de bzhazhishegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ ma 'o jags pa bzhi dang/ so so/

yang dgapar dag pa lan dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang/ byamasapa chen po dang/ snying rje chen po'i 'du shesan gnyis so// rgyun du zhugs pa dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba dad )phyir ma 'o ba dang//
dgra bcom kha dang/ lor sangs rgyas dang/ sangs rgyas kyi 'dushes na gnyis so// 'dus byas kyi khams kya'adu shes dang/ 'as ma byas kyi khams kyi 'dunas na gnyis so/ khab 'khyod de ltar de snyad

du'adu shes dang bcas pa thams cad dang/ de snyad du 'du shes med pa de dag thams cad na genyis te/ jitson du gnyas pa de tsam du dngos po'o// jatsam du dngos po yod pa de tsam du 'kher ba'o/ jatsam du
'khor ba de tsamadu sams can rnams skyo ba dang/ rga ba dang/ na ba dang ) 'chab dang/ mya ngan dang/ sa sngags 'don pa dang/ sdugabasngal ba dang/ yare ma bed ba dang/ 'khrug pa las longs su mi
ma grol 'dushes thams cad yadi la me da pas gnyis su med pa sto )rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang gnyis kyi 'du shes can la sbyin pa med pa dang/ tshul khrims med par ng )brjod pa med pa dang/
brtson 'grus med pa dang/ bsam ba/tan mang pa dang/ shes rab med padang/ lam mdakhadang/ thob pa med pa dang/ man par rtog pa med bar gupar bya'o// rab 'byor gnyisakya'adushes can lan
dun mthun pa'abazodapa lang mdazhu ) gzugs yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod 1tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/
skye mched dang/ khams rang/ natsang 'brel par 'byung ba yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ blangab dang po ba yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ bsam gtan dang po dang/ bsam gtan
0 @#/ gnyis pa dang/ bsam gtan gsum pa dang )bsam gtan bzhapa dang/ byams pa dang 1 sAng rjodang/ dga' ba dang/ btang snyoms dang/ nam mkha' mtha' yas sku mchod
[”]kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ rnam shes mtha ba las skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug ba dag/ cung zad med pa skyemachod kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ 'dushes lad bdu shasamed ga'i mchadakya snyegs bar

'tsho 'jug pa yongs su shes bar 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang/ chos rjes su dran pa dang/ dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang/ tshul khrigs rjes su dran pa dang/ gtong brjes su dran pa dang/

lha rjes su dran par ng/ skyob rjes su dran pa dang/ dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang/ 'chab rjes su dran pa dang/ lus kyi rmen pa rjesasun pa yongs su shes bar 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ martag/
( pa'i 'du shes dang/ sdug bsngal ba'i 'o du shes dang/ bdag med pa'i 'dushes dang/ ma sdug pa'i 'dushes dang/ dngos po med pa'i 'du shes dang/ bdag gi 'du shes dang/ sems can gyi 'du
shes dang/ srog ga 'du shesarang ) skyabag 'du shos dad gso bsha'adu shes dang/ skyosakhub 'du shes dang/ gang zag ga'adu shes dang/ shad can gyi 'du shes dang ) shesabadag ga 'du
shes dang/ byed pa po'i bdu shes dang/ tshor ba bo'i 'i dushesang/ shes pa po'i bdu shosadang/ mthong ba po'i 'du shes yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ rtag pa'i 'du
0shes dang ! bde ba'i 'du shes dang/ sdug par 'du shes dang/ bdagag 'du shes yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/
stong pa nyid dang ]mtshan ma med padar 3 smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzazhi dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang/ mthar rgyas gnas pa'i snyims par 'jugapa dgu longs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod//

rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rtog pa tshad larapyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzazhi dang/ rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/
sdug bsngal 'phagos pa' padan pa dang/ kun 'byung 'phags pa' bden pa dang/ 'gogapa 'phags pa'i bden pa dang/ lam 'phags pa' bden pa dang/ sdug sngal shesapa dang/ kun 'byung shes/
padang/ 'gog pa shes pa dang/ lam shesapa dang/ zad pa shes pa dang/ ma skyob shes pa dang/ chos shes pa dang/ rjes su 'gro ba shes pa dang/ kun rdzob shes padar/ 'dzas pa shes pa dang/

sgra jab zhazhe shes pa yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams rang 1 stong pa nyid thams cad yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ man pa shesapadrug dang/ ting nge 'dzin/
thams cad dang/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang debazhi'i gshag pa'i stobs rnams dang/ mo ba jags pa rnams dang/ so so la nga dag par ragi pa rnamasang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
@#/ 'dres pa rnams dang/ byams pa chen po dang/ snying rje chen po yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang/ lan cig phyi'i 'ong ba'i 'bras budang/

phyir ma 'ong ba'a'abras bu dang/ dga' comapa nyidadang/ rang cung rtsub dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyabar du yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod )gang la lam bsgom pa 'od ba de la rgyun du zhugs pa

'daM 'bras bu yang lta ga la yod/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ phyir a ri ba 'a 'bras bu dang/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang/ rang byang chub dang/ rnamapa thams cad mkhyen panyid kyakhor lang lta ga la yod/bag chags
rgyu kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spyas pa'ang lhag la yod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stod brag tu lta ba las le'u lta bcu ba rgyadabako// denus tshodang ldan
rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar dngos po'i 'du shes can la mthun pa'i bzod pa 'ang mamachi sa bas thob pa lta ga la mams te ma mchis/
mngon par rtogs pa yang lta ga la mchis te ma mchisAn/ ci lags bcom ldan 'das dngos bo ma mchis pa'i 'du shes can la mthun pa 'khezod pa ma/ dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa 'am/
[”]gis kyis 'an/ brgyad pa'i se 'am/ mthong ba'i sa 'am/ bsrabs pa'i sa 'am ) 'dod chags dang khralakha' so 'am/ byas rtogs pa'as 'am/ 'ang sangs rgyas kyis lam/ byang chub
sams pa' 'am/sangs rgyas kyis 'am/ lam bsgom pa gang la brten cing nyon mos pa gang gas bsgrubs pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud pa ram 'gyurab dang/ byang chub sems pa'i

skyon med par ma chud pas rnam pa thams cad makhyen pa nyid thob pa'am 'gyur ba dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidim thob pas/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad ma sbyong ba'i sgrib
pa nyan thos dang ldan pa 'am/ 'ang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i nyon mongasapa de dag sbyor bar 'gyur b.lam ma mchis sam) bcom ldan 'das gal te chos skya bor 'gyur ba gang yang skyo ba ma mchis na//
jaltar chos de dag ma skyod par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ dngos po med
pa' 'dushes can la mthun pa'i bzod ba med do// mngon par rtogs pa'i sa med do// dkar po rnagapar mthong ba'i sa med do// gos kyas med do// brgyadapa' semedado// mthong ba'i sa med do//
bsrabs pa'i sa chod do// 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa mad do// byas pa rtogs pa' sa med do// ngasangs rgyas kyis med do// byang chub sems dpa'i sa med do// sangs rgyas kyi sa med do// lam bsgom pa/

gang la brten cing nyon mongs pa gang gas bsgrubs pas/ pyang chub sems dpa' named par chud par ma 'gyur ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med parnam chud pas rnam pa thams cad makhyen pa nyid thob ]
par ma 'gyur bdar/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa de ma thob bas/ bag chags kyamatshams sbyor ba'i nyoshamongs pa thams cad ma sed pa'asgrub pa nyan thos dang ldan pa 'am//
rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i nyon mongs pa de dag stong bar 'gyur ba'i lam med do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das tsa'i gas/ byang chub sems dba' sams dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
'ol tu zhe pal spyod pa'i tsho/ dngos po mchis par 'du shes pa dang/ dngos bo ma mchis par 'dushes pa mchis sam/ gzugs su 'du shes pa dang/ tshor ba dang 1 na du shes rung/ 'du byed dang/
rnam par shes par 'du shes pa dang/ skya mched dang/ khams su 'du shes pa dang/ 'dod chagasasu 'du shes pa dang 'dod chags stangabar 'du shesapa dang/ zhe sdang du 'du shes pa dang//
zhe stang sang ba' 'dushesapa dang ) gamug tu 'du shes pa rang ) gti mug spang bar 'du shes pa dang ) ma ragi par 'du shes pa dang/ ma rig pa sbyang bar 'du shes ba dang/ 'du byed du 'du
shes pa dang/ 'du byed spang bar 'du shes pa dang/ rnam par shes par 'du shes dang/ rnams shes pa snang ba 'du shes pa dang/ mngadang gzugs su 'du shes pa dang/ ming dang gzugs
spang ba' 'du shes pa dang/ skye mched drug tu 'du shes pa dang/ skye mched drug spang bar 'du shes pa dang/ rig par 'du shes pa dang/ rogapa sbyang bar 'du shes pa dang/
pha0 tshor bar 'du shes pa dang ) tshor ba skyong bar 'du shes pa dang/ srid par 'du shes pa dang/ srid pa spang bar bdu shes pa dang ) len par 'du shes pa dang/ len la sdang
bar 'dushas ba dang/ sride bar 'du shes ba dang/ srid pa snang ba' 'du shes pa dang/ skya bar 'du shes pa dang/ skyab spang bar 'du shes padang/ rga ri 'du shes pa dang/
rga sha spang bar 'du shes padang/ mya ngan dang sa sngags 'don par 'du shes pa dang/ mya ngan dang sa sngags 'don pa sbyang bar 'du shes pa dang/ sdug bsngal du 'du shes pa dang ) sdug bsngal
sbyang bar 'du shes pa dang/ kun 'byung bar 'du shes ba dang/ kun 'byung spang bar 'du shes pa dang ) 'gog par 'du shes pa dang/ 'gog pa mngon du byobar 'du shes pa dang/ lamadu 'du shes pa/
dang/ lam bsgom par 'du shes pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang ) bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs ba thams cad sbyang bar 'du shes pa'i bar du mchis/
sa ba com ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor don yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa' tsho/ chos gang
la yang dngos po yod pa 'du shes pa dang/ dngos po med par 'du shes pamed do// gang la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa dang/ dngos po med par 'du shes pa med pa de nying na byang chub sems
@#/ par soms pa' chen po'abi/thun pa'i bzod pa'o// gang la dngos po yod par 'dushes pa dang/ des bo mdab 'du shes pa 'od de nyid ni lamakhasgom pa'o// gangal/
dngos po yod par 'du shes pa dang/ dngos po med par 'du shes pa med pa de nyidan 'brasabu'o// rab 'byor byang chub semasadapa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam 'ad ni dngos po med pa ste ) mngon pa
rtogasapa yang dangos po med pa 'o// ba 'byor de ltar rnam grangs des kyang 'ang ltar chos thams cad n dngos po med pa'i ri de nyid du rig par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos
thams cad dangos po ma mchis pa'i deb 'di lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ji lto de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur te/
de dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur nas chos thams cad la mnga' sgyur ba'i yul la mnga' bkres pa gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis//
tshadang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' sul te// ba 'byor 'ad long sngon byang chub samasadapa' sbyad pa spyod cing )parol tu phyin pa drug la dpa' tsha/ 'dod pas dben sdig to me deg pa
chos kyis dben pa// rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa// dben pa las skyes pa'i ngega' ba dang bde ba can/ bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// bsam gtan bzhi
pa'i bar la nye ba bsgrubs shang gnas par gyuranya ) 'on kyang ngas bsam gtade dag dang/ bsam gtan gyi yan lag de dgag mtshan mar yabazung sku/ bsam gtan de dag gsabasAms par m
gyur ) bsam gtan gyi 'i myong bar ma gyur/ bsam gtan du dmigs bar mAgyur to/ de ltar na ngas bsam gtand dag gi rnam pa yongs su dag pa la mnyam par gzhag go/ de ltar na ngas bsam
gtan de dag rnam par smin par byas nas/ lha' mog shes pa rnam pa tha dad pa mngon du bya ba'aphyo'i sems gzhol bar bya/ lha' rnyib shes pa mngon du byaba'i phyir sams gzhol bar bya/ ba rol
kyi sams shes rab mngond bya ba'aphyor sogs gzholab bya/ sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pa mngon du bya ba'i phyi'i sas sa gzhomabar bya/ lha'i mig ga shes pa mngon du byakha' phyiresams
gzholabar bya ) 'on kyang ngas mngon par shes pa mngon du byub de dag la mtshan maram bzungs 1 mnabalta shes pa de dag gis shes par ma gyur/ mo bar ma gyur/ dmags par ma gyur te/
mngonapar shes pa ltamo de dag mamakha' lta bu r yang dag par rjes su dran nas mnyam par gzhag ste/ de ltar ngas skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis blun mdapa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyasanas 'ani sdug bsngal lo// 'dan sdug bsngal kun 'byung ngo//'dzan sdug bsngal 'gog pa'o/ 'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gyub re ma go zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba
bzhanyid du yongasasu shes par gyur to/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang ldan par gyur/ ma 'jigs pa bzhadeng [7]so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ded/ byams pa chen po
dngas chen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang ldan par gyur nas sogs can rnams phung po gsum du lung bstan par gyur to// 'ab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
'das ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis dngos po ma mchis pa'ango bo nyid kyibasam gtan bzhi spyod par gyur/ jaltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug mngon par
mkhyen pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stegs bcu dang/ ma 'jigs pa bzhi deng/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzha deng/ byams pa chen po dang/ sAde rje chen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
brgyad skyodabar gyur)sams can rnams kyang sams can ma mchis par yang ji ltar rung po gsumadu lung bstan par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyasebaka' sul pa/ rab 'byor gal te
'dod pa rnams dang sdog to mdeg pa'i chos rnams la dngos po zhig yod de/ ngo bo 'di yod pa 'an/ gzhan gyi dngos po zhig yod na// rab 'byor ngas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/
'dod pa rnams dngos po med pa'i ri bo nyidi dang/ stage to ma dge ba'i chos rnams dngos po med par ri bo nyid du ga nas/ bsam gtan bzhanyapa bsgrubs te gnas par ma 'gyur to/ 'bo 'byor 'di ltar

ba04 yang 'dod pa rnams dang/ sngag to ma dge ba'i chos rnams la dngos po la dpa' bo nyid med pa gzhan gyi dngos po med pa ste/ gzhan du na dngos po med pa'i ri bo nyari ya'i las/ rab 'byor de'i phyi'i sngon nga
byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshi/ 'dod pas bon pa/ sngage to ma degaba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bdeb can/
bsam gtan dang po la skyo bar bsgrubs te gnas par gyur to// bsam gtan bzha pa'apher la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas par gyur to// rab 'byor gal te mngon par shes pa rnams la dngos po 'gi
yod de/ ngo bo de yodapa 'am/ gzhan gyi dngos po zhig yod na/ sha 'byor ngas kyang mngon par shes pa thams cad dngos po yod pa'i ngo bo nyid du rig nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa' byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma 'gyurato )ba khyor 'di ltar bsha bar shes pa rnams la dngos po med de/ ngo bo nyid med pa gzhan gyi dngos po med ngab ste/ gzhanadun dngos
po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas/ de'aphyi'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgrabcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis mngon par shes pa thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du thugs su chud de//
bla na med pa yang dgapar rdzogs pa'acing chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// ma 'byor rgyasagasol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltarabyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams
cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid labasam gtan bzhi dang/ mngon parta shes pa lcas bla named pa yang dag par rdzogasapa'i bye nga chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya na/
bcom ldan 'das ba'i slad du/ chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i bo nyidi la byang chub semasadapa' sems dpa' chen po ma thar gyis sngodapa dang/ mthar gyis slob pa dang/ mthar gyis nan

'pho tan dubargya ba gang gis byan mdapa yang dag par rdzogs pa' nga chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i mthar gyis sbyod pa dang/ mthar rgyase slob pa dang/ mthar gyis nan tan du bgyi ba
mchis par gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lta pa dum bu bzhi pa/bam po rab zha pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' swA lapa/
la 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' semasadapa' chen pos thog mar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang/ byang chub sams dpa' semasadapa' chen po dag dang/ sangs rgyas mang po la bstan
bkur ba'i dgabcom pa dag nga/ phyir ma 'ongab dang ) lan cigaphyir 'ong ba dang/ rgyun du zhugs pa dag las/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnamasadangos po med pa'i ri bo nyid dang/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyared/rang sangs rgyas rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyidi dang/ dgra bcom pa rnams dngos po med pa'i ri de nyid dang/ phyi ma 'od pa

[ rnams dngos po med pa'i ri bo nyidi dang/ lan cigaphyir 'ong ba rnams dngosakho med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang/ rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang/ 'phags pa thams cad dngos po med/
ba'i ngo bo nyide dang/ 'dukhyed rnams kyi ngo bo nyid chung du na/ skra'i rtse mo'i cha shasakyi gnas tsam yang yod do zhes bya bar mthongan ) byang chub sems dpasams dpa' chen po des/ tsa sto
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang dngos bo med pa'i ri bo nyid dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang/ dgrabcomapa rnams dang/ phyir ma 'ong ba rnams dang/
lan cigaphyir 'ong ba rnamasadang/ rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyang dngos po med pa'i ri bo nyid lazhin/ gal te bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs
rgyas kyang rung/ gal ta mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyang rung sta/ chos thams can dngos bo med pa lan gyis/ zhes kyang bodag na gdapa yang dag par rdzogs pa'aphying chub tu
mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par byasta/ sams canadangos po'i 'du shes can laspyod pa thams cad dngos po med pa la rab tu dgodapar bya'o snyam ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i
sams dpa' chen pade sams can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzlaba'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang dgapar rdzogasapa 'khyang chub chumangon par 'jug sgyu mthar rgyasi dpa ra 3 mthar gyis bslab pa/
nga/mthar gyisazhan tan du khyab gang labaslabs shing/ sngon rgya byeng chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams blun mang pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par

rdzogs par sas rgyas par gyupade ltabu'amathar gyis srungapang/ mthar gyis bslab pa dang/ mthar gyisazhan na du bya ba rtsom so// de thegagar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol

'tsha duphyin pa dang/ bzod pa'apha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin padang/ bsam gtan rgyale rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyaphe srol tu phyin pa da [） ]pha rol tu phyin pa drug la sdod do//

da spyan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'atsho/ bdag kyang sbya'ipa yongs su gtong ngo// pha rol kyang sbyin pa la rab tu 'jog go/ spyan pa legs pa brjod do// sams can gzhan gang sbyin pa longs su
gto bde dag ga leng legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do// de spyin pa des skyadeb chen po'i tshogs thob par 'gyur ta/ skyon dang sa' snamed pa'i sems kyis spyan pa sbyin par bya ba dang/
spyan pa yongs su gtong bar byed do/ zas 'dod pa la na zas sgom 'dod pa lan skem)bzhon pa 'dod pa latshwa bzhon pa/ gos 'dod pa lan gos spos la ded pa lan spres/ 'phrongab 'dod pa lan 'phru
ba byug pa 'dod pa lan byug pa/ mal cha 'dedapa la na mel cha ) gnas 'dod pa lan gnas/ maram 'dodapa las mar ma gtong bzhas ) ma'i yo byad gang ba mang rung ba dag kyang da rag la gtong ba

bar du ste/ spyan pa de nyid kyis tshul khrims kyaphung po yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ lha'i chab nyide dang/ ma'i che ba nyid ga cu thob par byed do/ de sbyin pa dang tshul khrims de nyid kyis ting/

nga 'dzin gyi phung po rab tu thob pa'abyed do// de sbyin pa dang/ tshul khrims dang/ nga nge 'dzazhi de ted kyis shes rab kyi phung bo rab tu thob par byed do// ngo sbyin pa dang de tshul khrims dang/
ting nge 'dzin dang/ shes rab de nyid kyis rnam par grol ba 'phying bo 'gatu thob par byed do// de sbyin pa dang/ tshul khrims dang/ ting 'dzin dang/ shes rab dang/ rnam par grol ba de nyid kyis
rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po rab tu thob par byed do// de sbyin pa dang/ tshul khrims dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ shes rab dang/ rnam par grol ba dang/ rnam par grol ba'i
ye shes mthong ba de nyid kyis// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis las 'das nas/ byang chub sems dpa' skyon med pa la 'jug go/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyonamed pa la zhugs nas/
sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs sug par byas/ sems can rnams yongs su sman par byas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// rnam pa thams cad makhyen pa nyid thebanas/
chos kyi 'khor la skor ro// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/ sams can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'god cing 'khor ba las yongs su 'grel bar byed do// rab 'byor de
ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pasamathar gyis sbyang pa yod pa yin te/ de thams cad kyang dmigs su med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na// de na 'di ltar de la//
ngo bo nyid med do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyod panas nye bar bzung sku ) bdag kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyong do/

gzhan yang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul lo// tshul khrims kyi b.rol tu phyin pa'i legasab brjod do// gzhan tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyod pa de dag g.yang legs pa
brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do// da tshul khrims ngs lha' che ba nyid dang/ ma'i che ba nyid rab tu thob par byed do// de nor med pa'i sems can rnams lanor sbyin zhing/ tshul khrims la 'ab
tu'agod do// ting nge 'dzan dang/ shes rab dang/ rnam par grol ba dang/ rnam par grol ba'i lo shes mthong ba la rab tu 'god do// de tshul khrims kyi phung po dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phung
po dang/ shes rab kyi phung po dang/ rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po des/ nyan thos dang sangs rgyas kyi sa la sa 'das nas/ tshul khrims

kyi phung po dang/ ting nge 'dzashi rgyaphung po dang/ shes rab kyi phung po dang/ rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang/ rnam par 'grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po de nyid kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' skyen
mdaparta'ajug go/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa byas ) sems can rnams yongs su sman par byas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/
pa nyid thob par byed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen ba nyid thob nas/ chos kyi 'khor loskoro// chos kyi'akhor lo bskor nas/ sems can rnams theg pa gsum laso so 'gedatsang 'khor
ba las yongs su 'golakha' byed do// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyis maThar gyis spyod pa yod pa bzhin te/ de thams cad kyang mgas su med do//
de ci'i phyir zhen/ da ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid med do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dba' sams dpa' chen po sems dang polaspyad pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ bdag kyang
bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyodo// gzhan yang bzod pa'apha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul la// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i legs pa brjod do// gzhan yang bzod pa'i pha rol
phyin pa la stong pa de dag ga yang legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do// de bzod pa'apha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sems can rnams sbyin pas yongs su tsham par byed do/ tshul
