[/ ]lnga brgya dang/ bu mo lnga brgya bo rdosang brgyan nas/ ma tog rnam pa sna tshogs thogs/ gos rnam pa mang po dang/ bdug pa dang/ skyes dang/ 'phreng ba dang byag pa dang// phye ma dang/
chos gos dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ bdan rnams thogs/ gser gyi ma togadang/ dngul gyi ma tog rnams thogs/ nyi pe che rnam pa sna tshogasodang/ gsar dang
nor bu dang/ mu tig dang/ bo zur dang/ dung dang/ man shel dang/ bya ru rnams thogs ]bza' ba dang ) bca' ba dang/ btung ba mang po thogs nas/ byang chub sems dpar sems
dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu du bodang lhan cagetu shing rta gcig la zhon/ bu mo lnga bcu pa de dag kyang shing rtalnga brgya la zhon pas yongs subaskor/ mdun du byas nas 'khor mang po dang lhan cig
chu shar phyogs kyi phyogs ga la ba de logs su dang cod/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu du ba mthar rgyas sod song na/ khyung rang panas spos
can phyogs grong khyer rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ mdzes shing lta na sdug pa// rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i ra ba bdun gyis bskor ba/ rta babs bdun dang ldan pa/ 'obs bdun dang ldan l/
shang nga la'i 'phreng ba bdun gyis bskor ba/ mchur dpag tshad bcu gachas yod pa/ zheng du dpag tshad bcu gaTis yod pa// phyug cing dar ba/ bde zhing skyid pa/ mi mang pos rgyas pa/ myong
dus rgyu srung ra mo la bris pa lta bu lnga brgyu dang ldan pa// bzhon pa dang lhan cig tu mchis te 'gro ba'i zam par bcas pa de lta bu mthong ngo// lamagyo bzhi mnga' dbusan yang byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshos kyis bkas ba rmongs kyi dan gyi steng na/ 'khyor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du byas nas/ tshes 'chad cing 'dug pa mthong ngo/ desam
ma thug tu 'dalta bu'i bde ba thob pa ni/ dper na bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs pa'i dge slong sems rtsa gcig tu gzhag pa de lta bu'i bde ba thob par gyur to// mtheng nas kyang
'di snyam du bdag shing rta la zhon bzhin du 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa chos kyis 'phags pa'i drung du'agro ba ma reshes so snyam du bsamanas/ deshing rta las babs
so// tshong dpon bu mo la sogs ba bu mo lnga brgya po de dag kyang shing rta de las bab sa so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu du ba de tshong dpon gyi bu molaso//
bu malnga rgyus yongs su bskor te/ mdun du byas nas dpag tu med pa'i rgyan rnams thogs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi 'phags pa gang na ba der song ngo// de
tshe byang chub semasadapa3sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pas shes rab rgya pha phol tu phyin pa'i khang pa brtsegs ma rin po che sna bdun las byas pa zhig byas te
tsan dan dmar pos brgyan pa mu tig gi dra bas 'brel ba/ rtseg khang gi grwa bzhir me mar gyi snang bar bya ba'i phyir/ nor bu rin po che 'od gsal ba rnams bkod do// dngul gyi phog por bzhi ya bar
snang las 'byung du bcug ste/ de nas a ka ru nag pogatsang ma'i brtug pa rnams 'al ba/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa'i phyir ro// rtseg khang de'i nang na rin
po che sna bdun las byas pa'i khra bzhi bzhag ste/ de'ang du rin po che'asgrom bu bzhagezhag go/ de'anyeng ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gser gyi glegs bam la/ ba zumu mthing
ka zhun mas bris pa bzhugs so// sdug khang de yang me tog dang/ dar sna tshogs kyi 'phreng ba rnams kyis sbyangs pas rab tu brgyan to// de nas byang chub semasadang/ 2
sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu du ba de tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu malnga brgya dang bcas pas/ khang pa rdzun ma de dpag tu med pa'i rgyunagyis brgyan pa mthong ste/ lha stong phrag du ma

waM rnams kyang mthong ngo/ lha'i dbang bo brgya byin yang lha'i ma dog man dar ba dang/ lha'i con dan gyi phyi ma dang/ lha'i gsar gyi phye ma dang/ lha'i dngul gyi phye mas khang pa rtsug mde la kun tu ro
mngon par 'thor/ rab tu mang na bar 'thor ba dang/ lhat+tasil snyan dag kyang sgrog ba thos nas/ byang chusams dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu du bas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la/
'di skad ces smras so/ lha'o dbang po khyed ci'i phyir lha stong phrag mang po dang lhan cig tu rin po khang brtseka ma 3da la me tog man da ra ba dang/ tsanadan gyi phye ma la sogs pas 'khyer/
mngon par sbyor/ lhaTasil snyan 'di dag kyang bar snang las lha rnams kyis cu'iphyir zlog/ deskad ces smras ba dang/ lha'i dbang po brgya byon gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dba' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba la do skad ces smras so// gas su khyod ma shes sam/ 'di (shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa'inyi masadapa' po
rnams ts+tsa nyes pa'o yum skyed par mdzad pa/ skyan pa gtso mo yin te/ gang la bsubs na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yon tan thams cad sku la rtsol tu phyin pa dang/
sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa ched thob bar 'gyur ba'o// de skad ces smas pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tudu bas/
lha'i dbang po brgya byin la ltadaskad kyis sbrus so// ko'u shrIka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de byang chub sems dbagasems dpon chen po rnams gces pa'i yumaskyedapa mdzadapa/ skrun pa
[zc ] btso mo de gang na bzhugs/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ 'o na lha khang ba khartsegs ma'i nang na gser gyi glegs bam la bri rgyun mthong ka zhun mas bus pa// byang chub sems
[! ]dbasems dbatachen bo chos kyis 'bags pas rgya rim pa bdun gyis btab ste bzhag bas bdag cag gis de khyed la bstan du mi rung ngo/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'
[“ ]sams dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu du ba/ tshong dbon rgyabu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu tshogs pas me tog dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ rin po che dang/ bdugs ba dang/ spos dang/
byug ba dang/ phye ma dang/ chos gos dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dun dang/ gser dang dngul gyi ma tog dag khyer te 'ongs pa de dag gas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
po la mchod par byas ste// de dag las kha cig ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la mchod par bya ba'i phyir bzhag ba// de nas byang chub sems dpa
sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas/ me tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ spos dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ byug pa dang/ phyi ma dang/ ges dang/ gdugs dang//
rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dang 3 sil snyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sngar mchod pa byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phag
pa gang na ba der songang/ so nas kyang byang chub sams dang lta sams dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la me tog dang/ bdu gu padang/ smyos dang/ 'breng ba dang byan ba dang//
khye ma dang 2 gos dang/ gdugs dang rgyal matsun dang/ ba dan dang/ tsan dan gyi phye ma dang/ gser dang dngul gyi me tog rnams kyis chos la mchod pa nyid kyi phyir tshe dang
'phags pal kun tu gtor/ mngon b.ru gto'o/ rab tu ungon par gtor to// denasam dogade dag byang chub sems dbaltasams dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pat+ti stang du ma dang//
ga rtseg khang du gnas par gyur to// gsar dang dngul gyi ma tog kha dog sna tshogs pa de dag kyang nam mkha' la gzhal yas khang du gnas par gyur to// chos gos dang/ gos ni/

po che dedag kyang bar snang la rin po che sna tshogs kyi sazhi lta bu r gnas par gyur to// byang chub semasadapalasamasadapa' chen po rtag pa/ lha rab tu du ba dang/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo pa sogs la 'u
mo lnga brgya po de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' [“]mas dpa' chen te chos kyis 'phags pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang/ cho'aphrul de lta bu dag mthong nas de dag 'di snyam du rgyun te/ byang
sa mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa 'di da ltar rdzu phul che ba dang/ de ltar mthu che ba dang/ de ltar ga[é] brjid che ba nge tsar me'o/ rtags kyi bu 'di
byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul dag rnam par thab[- ] lan/ namazla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tumano/
par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa na lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya bo de dag byang chub sems dpa3 sems dpa' chen
po chos kyis 'phags pa la dag ba bskyed nas/ de dag thams cad kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas bdag cag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis ma 'ongs pa'i dus
na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'osangs rgyas su gyur cig/ bdag cag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang chos gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
U chen pa chos kyis ltaphags pas theb pa'i chos de dganyid thob par gyur cig/ 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' mas dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa de ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa la bkur lta byed pa de ltar bdag cag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkur sti byed par gyur cig/ byang chub semasadapa3sems dpa' chen po chos rgyus 'phags pa 'di
ltar 'gro ba mang pol rab tu ston pa de ltar bdag cag kyang 'gro ba mang po la rab tu ston par gyur cig/ 'phags pa byang chub sas sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa 'di
shes rab kyi rol tu phyin la skabs mkhas pa dang snyan zhing yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de bzhin du 3 brtag cug kyang thabs mkhas pa dang deng longs su rdzogs par tshur tshu'i rtog
da lta rag kyang btab bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag pa rab tu ngu la da/ tshe 3 tshe tsA sog soltot+tA@#
zhibawa shes rab kyi ba po la tu byon pa la mchod pa byas/ byang chub sems dpa3sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa ka ga ang bar sgo byas na byang chub sems dang
dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa'i rkang pa gnyis spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ rje sadad bcas/ rim gro dang bcas te thal mo sbyar nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// las
gcig tu 'khod nas kyang byang chub sems dpa ltams dang rtachen po rtag par rab tu du bas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems da lta rgyun mi chos kyis 'phags kun da skad stel sgra[']
so// rigs kyi bu bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu zhi pa tshol ba na/ dgon pa zhig nas sgra thos nas/ rigs kyi bu shar phyogs su song zhig dang 3 de ltas shes rab kyi pha rol tu shu su ngu shos
par 'gyur ro zhes zer ro// de nas bdag gis sgra de thos pa dang/ shar phyogs gal ba der logs su song song ba las/ bdagasAdzAtse sangag gas sa de la bdag ji sAd
'gro dgos pa dang su la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos shing slob bar gyur snyam du ma dros so snyam du bsams so/ de ltar bdag yid mi dga' ba
dang ! mya ngan chen por gyur cing sa phyobasadi da na nyin zhag bdun lon te/ bdag dza sud cig tu 'gro dgos/ su las shes kha kyi kha rol tu phyin pa mnyan du yod ces:
ba na ma dros so snyam pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba yodil byed pa'i khyu ngan las gzhan pa'i kha zas bza' ba'i sems kyang ma skyes so// denas bdag gi mdun du de
bzhin gshegs pa'i sku byung nas/ des bdag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te// rigs kyi bu'adi nas dpag tshad lnga brgya na sbos can zhes bya ba'i grong khyer zhig yod de/ derasong
ci zhig dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa 'chad cing 'dug pa de khyod kyis cha mngabar 'gyur ro// de nasa'adakader de
bzhin gshegs pa'i skus bka' stsal pa bzhin du/ shar phyogs gang na ba de legasasu song ba las/ rkyang gi chos kyis 'phags pa chos 'chad cing 'dug pa mthong ngo/
mthong ma thag tu yang dper na bsam gtan dang po la mcham par gzhag pa'i dge slong gi bde ba de lta bu thob par gyur te// bdagadaga' zhing bde bdes khyab par gyur nas/sa phyogs de nyid
nas ma g.yos bar khyod shes rab kyi ba rol tu phyin pa 'chad cing 'dug pa thos so// de thos nas ting nge 'dzan gyi sgo brgya phrag du ma skyes par gyur to// bad ga de gsar dug pa'i tshe yang phyogs
bcunas de bzhin gshegs pa rnalas bdag la dbugs 'byin par mdzad cad rigs kyi bu dang nge 'dzin la da deganashes rab kyi sa ye'o tu phyin pa las byung ba yanye pas legs so legs so
nged kyis kyang de dag la gnas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs pa byas so// de nas skye bzhin gshegs pa de dag gsabadag la shin tu legs pa/ sa stan nas mnyes pa
gyur to// bdag kyang ting nge 'dzan de las langs nas 'di snyam du gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/ de bzhone ka shesan pa de dag gar kaM shegs/ gso
denas yang bdag 'di snyam du gyur te/ 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa de ni sngon gyi rgyab bya ba yA pa dge gshAwakan pa
pa shes rab kyi pha ro'idu khyen par gabs mkhas la bslabs pa yin pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon pa dang de bzhin shashegs pa de dag ga ra
du bzhud pa de bdag la ston to snyam mo/// de bas na rigs kyi bu khyod la de bzhin gsheshar pa de dag gang nas byon/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud pa bdams/ pa
rigs kyi bu khyod gyis de bzhazhi gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon pa dang/ gar bzhud pa canas kyang bdag gis shes ba'agyur ba dang/ dbazhin gshegs/
pa mthong bar gyur ba de lta bu r bdag la ston cig/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/ rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i le'u ste bdun cu rtsa bzhi pa'o//
@#/ de skad ces smras pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa3sems dbaltachen pa chos kyis 'phags pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tudu
ba la 'di skad ces sbas so// rags kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams na gang nas kyang ma byon/ gang du yang ma bzhud de/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams na mo g.yo ba'o/
! dbazhin ched gang yin pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu skye ba med pa la ni'itho ba 'am 'ong ba med de// skyeb med pa gang yan ba dezhu de bzhin gshegs pa 'o//
'gis kyi bu yang dag pa'i mtha' la na 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med de/ yang dag par mtha' gang yin pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu stong pa chad lana'agro ba'am 'ong bamed
de de stong pa nyid gang yin pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu rnalta ba nyid la na'ong ba'am gro ba med de/ jalta ba nyid gang ni pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa'o/
rigs kyi bu 'dod chags dang la ba la ni 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med de/ 'dod chags dang bral ba gang yin pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'gag pa ni 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba mi/
de 'gog pa gang yin pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu nam mkha'i nga dungs la ni 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba red de/ nam mkharI dbyangs gang din pa de na re ba 'an kabaka
pa'o// jigs kyi bu chusa'adi rnams las gzhan pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin no// rogs kyi bu chos 'di rnams kyi de bzhon rkade gang yin pa dang/ de na gshegs pa de tshor
ched gang yin pa de dag ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ rogs kyi bu de bzhin chade la na rnam pa gnyis su med do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid nag tsaka de// gatsha sa ma yin/ gsum sa na de
ragisakyi bu 'ang ltar de bzhin da ni med pa'-i phyir bgrang ba las 'das pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'di la// dper nam zhig dbyar zla tha chung ga re mtsho glu gar dpud kyi 'o ma'i tsho bdu ngas ra/

smig rgyu g.yo ba mthong ba dang/ de dang de dag tu rgyug cing 'dar khrus bya'o// 'dir chu btung ngosnyam du semasan/ rigs kyi bu de jo snyam du sems/ de gang gangs ljongs shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po wAn

lho phyogasadang/ nub phyogs dang/ byang phyogs kyi rgyu mtsho chen por 'gro ba 'am/ gang du 'gro/ rtag par rab tungu sas snyasapa/ 'gos kyi bu smig rgyu pa bstod pa ma yin de la 'gro ba ma stong ba lta ga
yod/ rigs kyi budapyod kyi tshe bas gdungs pa' mo de zhu smig rgyu med pa chur 'du shes bskyed pas/ byas pa'i rigs shes rab rtul po'aroges te/ den chu'i/
po ngolo nyade na yod pa ma yin no// chos kyis 'phags pas smras ba/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bude bzhin du gang su yang rung ba 'ga' zhig de bzhin gshegs pa/
lagazugs sam/ sgyur mngon par zhen pas/ de dag dbazhin gshegs pa byon pa dang/ bzhud par rtog pa de dag thams cad na byis pa'i rigs/ shes rab rtab po'i 'obs so zhes brjod pa byas
dper na mi zhig chu med pa la chur 'du shes bskyed pa bzhazhin// de ci'i phyire zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku yin pas gzugs kyi skur mi blta'o/ bshes kyi bu chosade la zhi 'gro ba
N+NaM 'am 'ong ba med de/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnamasal yang byon pa yang meng/ bzhud pa yang med do// rigs kyi bu dpon na sgra ma mkhan gyis sprul pa'i glang po che'atshigs
sam/rta'i tshogasasam/ shing rta'i tshigs sum/ rkang thang gi tshogs la 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba mdade/ rags kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegasal rnams la yang byon pa 'am bzhud pa med
do// 3gis kyi bu dbashamazhi ga'i rmi lam du de bzhin gshegs pa gtsagi kam)gachosasam/ gsum mam/ bzhi'am/ lnga 'am/ bcu'am/ shu 'am/ sum cu 'am//
[/ ]ba zhi bcu 'am/ lnga bcu 'am brgya 'am stong ngam/ brgya phrag stong dum/ de bas kyang mang ba mthong nas/ sad pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa gcig kyang ma mthongan rigs kyi khu de dza/
snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gar bzhud ! rtag par rab tu du bas smras pa ! rigs kyi bu rmi lam gyi chos la nageng nas kyang
su grub pa med de/ rmi lam nabardzun pa yang dag pa ma yin pa'o// chos kyis 'phags pas smras pa rigs kyi bu de bzhin du tshos thams cad na rmi lam dang 'du 'o zhes de bzhin gsheg par
gsungs te/ rigs kyi bu gang su yang rung chos thams cad ni rgyu lam dang 'dra'o zhes de bzhin gshegs pas bshad pa legs par ma shes pa de dag na/ de bzhune gshegs bka' mi
gi tshogs sum gzugs kyi tshogs du mngon pa zhen pa su de dag na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byon pa dang bzhud par rtogs te/ 'di ltar chos nyide rab tu ma shes pa'i phyir tshe:
'ges kyi dung de bzhin gshegs pa byon pa 'am/ bzhud par 'dod pa de dag thams cad na byas pa soso skye bste/ de dag thams cad ni 'gro ba lta'i 'khor bar 'dong 'dong bar 'gyur te//
de dag thams cadun shis rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thag ring/ de dag thams cud nas ma rgyus kyi chos rnams dang thag rang ngo/ rigs kyi bu gang dag de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams can
lam lta bu 'o zhes bshad pa legs par shes pa de dag ni/ chos gang yang 'ong ba rnama'agro bar ma rtog pa'o// gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshes 'ded lta bu r rab tu shes//
bde dban/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung chub tu nyaparagyur to// de dganashis dam kyel tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o// de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'aslob ma ste/ grong khyer gyi
bsod snyoms de yod par za'o// de dag na 'jug rten pa'i sbyin gnas so// ragisakyi bu'adi lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen pa'i rin po che rnams no/ shar phyogs nas kyang ma 'ongs/
lho phyogs dang/ nub phyogs dang/ byang phyogs dang/ phyogs mtshams rnams dang/ stong dang/ 'og dang/ phyogs bcu gang nas kyang ma de ngas mod kyi/ 'on kyang sems can

pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyus/ rgya mtsho chen por rin po che rnams 'byung ste/ de dag rgyu med pa las 'byung ba yang ma yin gyi/ rgyu dang rkyen rnams la rag lus pa rten cing 'brel pa las 'byung ba'o//

ran po che de dag med par gyur na yang khyogs bcu gang du yang ma 'gos te/ dang bamed mod kyi/ 'on kyang rkyen gang rnams yod pa las/ zhi po che de dag 'byung ba'i skye de rnams med par 'a gyur ba las
[/]dzan pa tsho de rnams med par 'gyur ro// bgasakyi bu de bzhin dud bzhi gshegs pa rnams kyi sku yongs su rdzogs pa yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang nas kyang ma byon gang du yang mi bzhud do//

(sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku de dag rgyu med pa las byung ba yang ma yin gyi/ sngon gyi spyod pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa la rag lus pa/ rgyu las kun tu byung ba sngon gyi las kyi rnam/

par smin pat+taM sems can gyi dmigs pa dang ldan pa las snang// phyogs bcu gang na yang yod pa ni ma yin gyi/ rgyu dang rkyenakang rnams yod pa las sku de ngos su rdzogs pa ra 'a ra ba'i rgyu dang rkyen de/
rnams med pa dang yongs su rdzogs bar mi 'gyur ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dperan pa wang gasgra'abyung ba'i tsho gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/ 'gag pa'i tshe gang du yang ma kaT/ gang du yang nyasob

med pa la brten cing yang 'byang/ rgyu dang rkyen la rnaga'u saso// 'ju lta ste/ dper na pi wang ga kheg pa dang pags pa dang/ yu ba dang/ rgyud dang/ blung bdad/ sbyang shing dang/ mirtsol ba la brten zhus pa

ga sgra 'byung ste/ sbya de yang leg pas kyang ma byung/ pags pa dang/ u ba dang/ rgyud rnams dang/ sbyang shing las kyang ma byung/ byung ba dang/ ma'i rtsol ba 3sa kyang ma byung mod kya desha kyang thamar

'dus shing ldan pa las sgra 'byung ngo// 'gag nga na yang spu de gang du yang maM ge'o/ gsakyi bu de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dang rnams kyi sku yongs su rdzogs pa yang rgyu dang rkyen la rag lus pa ste:
dge ba'i rtsa ba du ma las yongasaMsu rdzogs pa'o// rgyu cig las ma byung/ rkyen gcig las ma byung/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gcigs sangs rgyas kyi sku byung ba ma yin no/ rgyu ed la gas
byung ba'ang ma yin te/ rgyu dang rkyen du ma tshegs pa las byang ba gang nas kyang ma byon/ rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa med na yang mi bzhud do// rigs kyi bu de ltar khyed kyis
de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams byon pa dang/ bzhud pa med par blta bar bya'o/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos thams cad kyi chos nyid kyang de bzhin du rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de
bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang/ chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang/ 'gag pa med par rab tu shos na/ khyod blag med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha
la tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa la yang nges par rtog par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byon pa dang bzhud pa med pa'i ston pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad na/ sa chen po rab tu
g.yos par gyur/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul// rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/
to bdud kyi goms thams cad kyang 'khrugs nyams par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen pa 'jig rten gyi khasasan/rtswapeshong dang/ smanudang (nags tshalarje snyad yod pa de dag thams cad kyang/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa gang na bde logs su rab tu btud par gyur to// dus ma yin par yang me tog rnams kyang byung bar gyur/ stong na bar snang 'byar/
me tog gcar rab tu 'bab par gyur/ rnga'i sgra rnam pa sna tshegs pa rnams kyang stang gabar snang las grogs par gyur te// rgyal poman po bzhi dang/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyisa'aphags pa lha'i me tog man dar ba dang/ sgra'i gdan gyi phye medang/ lha3 che khegang/ phye chagazhan dag gas kyang gtor mngon pa gdo'o
rab tu mngon par gter nas tshig 'di skadaskyasaso// rigs kyi bu khyod kyi yon tan rgyas deng bdag cag rnams kyis kyang/ don dam ma las byung ba'i gtam 'jig rten thams cad kyis yod ces bar dka' ba/
'jig tshogs la gnas pa byang chub sems dpa' rnamasakyis ma yin par bashadapa thos/ des khyang chub semasadapa'asems dban rtsen po rtag par rab tu ngu khas/ byang chub
sems dpa' semadapa' chen po chos kyi res 3phags pa 'di skad ces smras so// sa chen po 'du g.yos pad lta rigs gang zhi/ rkyen gang dge chos kyis 'phags bas smas ba/ rigs kyi khu

de bzhin gshegasapa rnams byon pa med pa dang bzhudapa med pa bshad pa de khyodakyis des/ ngas bshad pan srog chags brgya stong gis ma skye ba'i chosal bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur/ bye ba phrag brgyad cus brun
med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'ibyang chub tu sems bskyeng/ sreg chags stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi ni rdul med cing dri mamed par gyur nas/ chos la chos kyi mig rnam par dag par gyur pa'i phyi'i
go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba dga' zhing rab tu dka' ba chen po dang ldan par gyur te/ bdag gis kyang shes
ka rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byon pa dang/ bzhud pa med pa'i chos bshad pa 'di longs su dris pa lus/ sems can dzasnyed cig gi don byas pasanabadag gas

med pa rab tu rnyed de// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i bdag gi dege ba'i rtsa ba nodi nyid kyashes chog go/ da phyin chad nAbadag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byung chub la the tshom mo'abyung/ bdag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba la dgos pa ma byed desnyam nas/ de dga' zhing rab tu dga' ba dang/
'di bde ba de nyid dang ldan pas shing ta la bdun tsam gyinamamakha' la 'phags gas/ shing ta la bdun tsam gyi nam mkha' la gnas te// 'dusnyamadu bdag 'di ltar bar snang la 'dug nas/byang chub sems
dpa' sems da pa'achen po tshos kyis 'bags pa'acas mnod snyam du bsams pa dang/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag
par rab tu du ba nam mkha' la 'phags pa mthong nas/ de'i sams yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes to/ lha3mi rtog man da ra ba dag de la byon nas 'di skad ces sa so// rigasatu khyod
ma tog 'di dag gse'abags pa byang chub sems dbaltasams dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa 'do da 'byos shig/ rtagis khyabu khyedakyi mthus deng sems can stong phrag mang rnams
kyi don byas par gyur pa'i phyir/ 'gos kyi bu khyod la ded kyis lan gdags so/ gi kyi bu khyod kyis ji ltar sbyobakhyas pa de lta bu r gang sems can thams cad kyi don bskal ba tshod chod grong/
med pa'i krob byed pa'i sems can de lta bu dag rab tu dkon no// de nas byang chub sems da paltasams dpa' chen po rtag par rab tudu bas/ wA'adebang bo brgya byin las me tog mnad ra bdag
blas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la gtodo/ mngon par gtor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phagasapa 'badag gi lus
kyis kyang bkab nas tsheg 3de skad ces smramatshaka'agA kyi bu khyod la deng bzhuchad g.yog bya ba'i phyir/ bdag gsalus kyang 'bul la zhesanas/ de bar snang las babs te bdag phuganas/ byang chub sen
dba' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa'i mdun du thal mo sbyar nas 'dugu no/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de dang bu mo' bcu po de dgagos/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba 'di skad ces smras so rigs kyi bu khyod la bdag cag kyang 'dawer lus 'bulal// bdag cag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'das chos de dag nyidi thob par
gyur tsog/ phyin chadakyang khyed nyid dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas dang/ bungachub sems dpa' rnams la mchod pa byed par gyur cig/ khyod dang lhan cig tu gnas par
gyur cig/ de nas byung chub sems dpa' sems dpaN chen ba rtag par tshub du bas tshongadapon gyi bu mo de dang bumo lnga brgya po de dag la 'di skad cos smras so// bu mo khyedasnying nas nga'i bsam
[]bo dang mthun pa byed cing [u0f10 ]snying nasang la lus 3bul na ni nga yang khyed len to// bu mo de dag gis sbas pa/ bdag cag khyod la snying nas bsam pa dang mthun par byed cing khyod dgos pa bya
ba'i phyir snying nas lus 'bul lo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu du bas/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po rnams rgyun nyams cad byas
klubs/ shing rta lnga brgya po de rnams kyang rgyun cus brgyan nas/ thams cad byang chub mas dpa'ams dpa' bo chos kyis 'apags pa la phul te/rigs kyi bu khyod la bu mo 'di rnamasadang/
shing rta lnga bcu po'adonems yongs su spyad b.ru bya ba'i lor dbul lo zhes smras so// de nas debad bo brgya byin gyis/2shis kyi bu de la rage la bu 'gasas rigs so zhes sa
legasapa khyon te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub semasadapa' sems dpa' chen po dag gi ltar bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar bya'o// gdong bat+taM sams de lta bu d ga gsan/byang chub sems dpa' sems

chen rnams myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// chos smra ba la de ltar mchod pa byas na/ shes rab kyi la rol tu phyin pa'i thabs la mkhas pas

nus par 'gyur ro// ston gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de rnams kyis kyang ston byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tsi/ rtong bdi ltabu la gnasanas/blun
mod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byad rukun tu bskyungs/ shes rab kyi ba re'atu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa yang yongs su drangs so// de nas byang+gachub samasad pa'asems dpa' chen pa chos kyis 'phags

pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu du ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par bu ba'i khyi'i/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lta brgya po donams dang/ shing rta lnga brgya blangs so//
blangasanas kyang rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i rogs kyi bu de nyid la slar byon no// de nas byang chub sems dba'asams dpa' chen po chos kya'aphags pa stan las 'das nas bdag gi

tsam du song ngo// nyim yang nub par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par ri ba tu du pa 'di snyam du gyur te/ bdag tshos 'dod pa'i phyi stongs la 'dug pa 'am/nyal ba ni leg
ba ma yonel/ bdag gi cha ma yazhi byas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa bdag gi khyim nas chos 'chad pa'i phyir ma byung gi bar du 'greng ba 'am/ 'chag pa gnyis
[ra; ])kya@#// kyi spyod lam gyis bsdad dosnyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dbaltasems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa lo bdun du snyoms par zhugs pa gcig la gnas te/ byang chub

[n ]sams dpa'i ting nge 'dzin shes rab kyi pha rol tu byon pa'i thabs mkhas pa las byung ba stong phrag grangs med pa tshad med pa la gnas par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par 'ab
dungu ba yang l bdun du 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog ba ma skyed/ gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog padang/ 'tsho ba'i rnam bar rtog pa dang/ rol chags pa ma skyed kyi/ gzhan du na khyung chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa'i rigs kyi bu de stanugangal 'dug nas chos 'chad pa'i chos kyi stag gdang bar byan/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags
ba 'dalangs pa rnatsam na mthong snyam pa dang/ sa phyogs gang du byang chub sems dpa'angesams dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'-i thabs mkhas pa'achad pa3zhes

phyogs de yang phyag bdar byas shing chag chag btab la/me tog sna tshogs kyis kun tu gtor resnyam pa las bsam pa gzhan med do// chod dpon gyi bu mol sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de rnams kyang byang chub sem
dpa' sems dpa' chen partag par rab tu nguba'i rjes suslob cing spyodo'am gnyis pa denyid kyis dod cing 'khod do// bya ba thams cad kyang de dang rjes su mthun par bya dgo ne nas byang chub samAdapa'

soms dpa'achen po chos kyis3phags pa zhag bdun na ting nge 'dzan de las ldang ste/ gangs nas kyang grong khyer gyi dbus su chos 'chad do zhes zer ba'i sgra nam mkha' las byung ba/ byang chub semasadapalta sam

dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu du bas nyes so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas sgra de thos nas/ dga' mgu ya'ings rab tu dgolta zhing 'di bde ba skyes par gyur nas

tshod dpan gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya pa rnams dang lhan cig tu sa phyogs de byi dor byas nas/ chosakya stan rin po che sna bdun las byas pa yang ba ting ngo// donas tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa/
bu mo lnga brgya pa thams cad kyis/ bdag cag ga bu go lus la sa bud de stan gang la byang chung semad dpalta mas dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa 'dug ste/ chos 'chad pa'i chos kyi snyan der/

gu gesalnga brgya stan du btang/ de nas byang chub sems dpat+tasems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bos sa phyogs de chag chag gdab pa'i phyir/ kho ra khor yug tu chu btsalan/ sa phyogs der chakachag gdab
pa'i chu bdud sdig tecan gyis ci nas kyang ma snang bar byas nas/ byang chub sems dang na sams dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu du ba chu ma red nas/ sems la sdug bsngal dang saMde mi dga' ba
dang/ sems gzhan du gyur te/ de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba med par gyur cing/ mchod pa de yang ngan pa: gyur pa de lta bu r bya'i phyir/ chu de chod par byas nas chum rnyid par gyur to// de nas byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu du ba 'di snyam du gyur te// 'on bad ga gi lus phug stes phyogs 3da khrag gis chag chag gdab bo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
sa phyogs 'di ni rdul cha ste/ rdul de dag byang chub sems dpa' semasadapa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa'i lus la yogazhas ma rung bar gyuran/ bdag galus nges par 'jig par 'gyur ba 'dis ci zhig bya/
bdag gi lus don med par chud zes pa bas 'daltarabyas n/ bdag gi lus med par gyur kyang bla'o// bdag gi lus stong phragadu ma 'dod ba'i rgyu dang 'dod pa'i gzhu dang/ 'dod pa3 mtshan mar
'khor ba na yang dang yang du kha ba'i rgyud zos kyis/ gnas 'dalta bu dag tu ni masong ngo// de nas byang chub sems dba' sams dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu du bas mtshon rnon po zhig thogs te/
bdag gi lus kun tu phuganas/ sa phyogs de kun bdag gi khrag gis chag chag btab// tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya padi rnams kyang byang chub semasadapa' sems dpa' chen po rtag
khar rab tu duba'i rjes su skyob bas/ thams cad kyis mtshon rnon po srungasanas/ bdag cag gi lus phug ste/ sa phyogs debadag cag gi khrag gis chag chag btab po// byang chub sems dpa'
i sams dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu du ba dang/ bu mo de rnams kyang sems gzhan du mgyur te/ bdud sdig to can gyis dge ba'i phyogs la bar chad bya ba'i skabs red par yang magyur to/
di nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyamadu gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'ams dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu du ba de 'di ltar chos 'dod pa dang/ de ltar yi dam la brtan pa dang/ go cha chen po bshos
pa dang/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir lus dang srogalam lta ba dang/ khan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyasas lhag pa'i
bsam pas 'doltarasams na rnams 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa las yongs su thar par bya bar sems pa de ngomatshara'o// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byan rgyas khrag de tham cad
lha'atsan danatsachur khyan byas brlabasaso// sa phyogs de kha khor yug kyang lhat+taM tsan dan gyi chu'i dra bsamatshos mi khyab pa/ dpag tshad brgya'i bar dubasung bcasaso// de nas lha'adebad ba
byin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu du bas 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyed kyi brtson 'grus bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'khyod tshos 'dod pa dang/
chos tshol ba bla na med bde legasaso legs so// rigs kyi bu ston gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas rnams skyabs kyang/ lhag pa'i bsam pa de lta bu dang brtson/
'bru de lta bu dang chos 'dodapa de lta bu s ban med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsgrubs so// de nas byang chub semasadapa'asems dpa'an po rtag par rab tudub 'dosnyamadumyur to
byabya/ bdag gis 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa'achen po chos kyis 'phags pa'i chos kyi snyan ni bting zin/ sa phyogs 'di yang chag chag btab cing phyag bdar byas zin/
sa phyogs 'dzadag tu me tog gang gis gtor ba dang/ 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pachos 'chad pa la gtor ba'i ma log bdag gas ga las red snyam pa dang 'dems
lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po rtag par rab tu du ba la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bulha'am rtog man da ra ba 'da rnams khyed la nad dag gsas khyogs/
'do'i khyod kyi lo rtog gis gter cig/ 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'asams dpa' chen pos kyis 'phags pachos kyi stan la 'dug cing chos 'chad pa la yang gtor cig ces nas des lha'i
ga man da ra ba kha la bzhi brgya de la bzhi no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu du bas me tog de dag blangs te/ ma rtog de dag kha cig nas phyogs der gtor ma tog kha
na byang chub sems dpa'asams dpa' chen pa chos kyis 'phags pa la mchod pa'i phyir gzhag go/ de nas byang chub sems dba' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'alags pa le bdun lon dang/

ating nge 'dzin de las langs nas/ chos[”]stan gang na 'dug pa der song nas stan bting ba 'dug// 'khor brgya stong du mas yos su skor adun du byas zhus shes rab kyi la rtsol tu phyin pa 'chadade/ de nas byang chub sems

[oj]da pa'asems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu du ba tshong dpon gyi zhu cho la sogs pa/ bu mo lnga brgya dang bcas pas/ byang chub semasadaba'asamasadapa'achinape tshes kyis 'phags pa la che rtog de dag gis mchod/
byas so// de nas byang chub sems dpasamasadapa'achen po rtag par rab tu du bas/ byang bsams pasams dpa' chenape tshogs kyis 'phags pam 'ongazhas/dpe na dge slong bsam gtan dang po/

la snyoms par zhugs po yod la byed pa rtse gcig tu gyur de lta bu'i bde ba rab tu thob par gyur to// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa/ shes rab kyi la gol tu phyin pa'i chos

'chad pa'i da ltaste chos thamasacad mnyam pa nyid pas/shes rab kyi la rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid de/ chos thams cad rnam par dben pas/ shes rab kyi yaphel tu phyin pa rnam par dben no// chos thams

cad mgayeb ched kyi phyir/shes rab kyi pha ro'atu phyin pa mi g.yo ba nyid do// tshes thams cad sems med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi ba la'o tu phyin pa sems med pached do sa thams cad mthun pa med pa'i phyir/

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pamanan pa med pa nyid do// chos thamasacad regacig pa'i phyagashes rab kyi khe rol tu phyin pa regacigapa nyid do// sa thams cad matha' yas pa'i khyi'i shes rab kyi pha rol tukhyen

lamatha' yas pa ched do//chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyis rol tu phyin pa skye ba med pa red// chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi la phel tu phyin pa 'gag pamed pa de//
nam mkha' mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi sutu phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid de// rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthar yas pa nyid do//
rab bilAburnam pa sna tshogs pa'i phyi'i/ shes rab skal tu phyin pa sna tshogs pa chenado// zham mkha' ltar rnam par ma rtog pa'i phyir/ shes rab kya ba rol tu phyin pa rnam par mi rtog pa nyid de//
gzugs mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha la tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid de// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang// 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha
de'i khu phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid de// sa'i khams mtha' yas pat+ti phyir/ shes rab la 'o tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid do// de bzhin du chu'i khams dang 'ame'i khams dang/ rlung gi khams mtha'

las pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha phol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid do// nam mkha'i dbyangs mkhya' yas pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha 'o tu na pa mtha' yas pa nyatede/ rdo rje lta bu r chos thams cad s la/
pa nyid du gyur pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha la tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do// chos thams cad 'jig pamed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig pa med pa nyid de// chos thams cad sogs
su med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa nyid do// chos thams cad rnam par 'byed pa mnyam pachad kyi phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do//

chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa g.yo ba med pa chaded// chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid du cig/
par bya'o// denas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu du ba de bzhin du 'dug pa las/ de'atshe chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid yin pa3phyi'i/ tshes thams cad manyan
pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin des par 'byung ngo// chos thamasad dben pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge'adzan dang/ chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzan nang/ chos thams cad sem
pa med bzhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos thams chu mtshon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzanadang/ chos thams cad gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzan dang/chos thams cad mnyayas pa zhes

bya ba'i ting nge 'dzan dang/ sathams cad skyeb med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos thams cad 'gug pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ nam mkha' mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i rting nge 'dzag/

dang/ rgyu mtsho mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ 2rib rnam pasna tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ nam mkha' lta bu zhes bya ba'o tong de'adzan dang/ gzugs mtha' yas pa zhes bya

ba'i ting nge 'dang/ tsho ba dang/ 'du shes dang 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang sa'i khams mtha' yasapa zhes ba'i tange nge 'dzin dang/ chu'i khams dang )
me'i khams dang/ rlung ga khams mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzazhi dang/ namakha'i khams mthar sa pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzan dang/ rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i tong de dzan

dang/ chos thams cad mi byed pa zhes gruba'i tidi de 'dzani dang/chos thams cad ngo bo nyidi dmigs su med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzan dang/ chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i

ting nge 'dzani dang/ chos thams cad spyod pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos thams cad bsamagyis ma khyab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dza'i rnam shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bshad pan rab/

du thob par gyur te// de la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo stong phrag drug brgya/ byang chub sems dab3sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu pas rab tu thob par gyur to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong
phrag nyikulta pa las/ chos kyis 'phags pa'i le'u ste bdun cu lnga pa'o/// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu du bas ting nge 'dzin gyi slob

phrag drug cu thob ma thag tu shar phyogs dang/ lha phyogs dang/ nub phyogs dang/ byang phyogs dang/ mtshams rnams dang/ blunang/ 'og dang/ phyogs bcu'agang+gA'i klung ga byi ma skyed stong gsum gyi steng
chen po'i 'job rten gyi khamasan/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i gos kyis mdun du byas pa/ dge slongagi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor ba/ tshul 'datedi dang/ mang 'di
00 nyid dang/ tshig 'di dinang/ yag 'di nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyidi'achadu ba mthong bano/ dper na stong gsum kyi stong chen po3 'jig rten khams 'dan/ nga byang chub sems/
duba'i tshogasakyis mdun du byas shing/ dge slong gdage 'dun rgyus yongs su bskorakha/ tshul 'di nyidi dad/ ming 'di nyid dang// tshig da hodi dang/ ya ge 'ad ched kyis shes brgyal sog tu ban ga chad

cing 'dug pa lta bu 'o// da bsamabyas ma khyab pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pas/ thos pa rgya mtsho lta bu dang ldan par gyur te// tshe rabs thams cad du yang nams kyang sangs rgyas dang ma 'bral bar gyur to//
tsher bas thams cad dugang dang gang nasangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dang der skyongs nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mngon sum du myosan te// chung
dun rmi laman yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong ba dang mo'abul ba dang/ sa nyan pa dang byang chub sems dba' mthong ba dang ma 'bral lo// de ma khem pa thams cad spangs shangedal khyer
dad ldan par gyur to// denas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'a'adaskad ces bka' stsal te/ (kun dga' bzlamagrangs 'das 'doltar rtage par bya'o/ shesarab kyi kha dog tu
rgyun pa na byang chub de las dba' sems dpa' chen sgom kya thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob pa byed pa'o// dekhas na kun dag2 bo byang chub sems dpa3sams dpa' chen po mA cad mkhyen pa'ashe thobab
[q]/ @#// 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyad par bya'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa kun dga' bo khyod kyis byang/
ka chub sems dpa' sems dab2chen po rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir/shos rakyi ba rol tu phyin 'ad zung zhig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par rgyas shig tshul bzhin du yod latshos

shog/ gzhan dag la tshad rgyucher ston cig kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dba'asams dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang zhan pa'amyazur ba skya/bcad ga' bya bkug par bya
kun chub pakhya bsgrags par byu bstan par bya/bshad par bya/kha don du bya/ btu bsgom par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa byin rlabs kyis/ chung du na thags baa chen pa la ya gi gsal bar bris

( ShA matogadang/ bdug pa dang/ skyes dang/ 'breng khadang/ byug pa dang/ phye ma dang/ gos dang/ gdugs dang/ lamtshan dang ba dan dang/ kho ra khor yug tu yang mar ma'i'aphreng ba rnam pa du mas mchod cing/
rim gror bya/ bla marabya/ bsti stang du bya mchod par@/ rjed par@/ gus par bya sta/ 'danongs rjes su gdams pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhen kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' mas dpa' chen pornamA

thos kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub na/shes rab kyi sa srol tu phyin pal rag lus pa'i phyir ro/ kun staga' bod dzasnyam du sems khyod kyi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa 5nam/kun dga' bos
gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gseston pa lags so// bde bar gshegs pa bgag sten pa lags so// de skad cesagasol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' 'ol 'deskad ces/
bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyi ston pa yin te/ khyod kyis yongs su spyad de// kun dga' bo khyod kyis byams pa'i lus kyi las yid du 'ong zhing/ yid du mi 'ong ba ma yin pa

dang 'byams pa'i ngag ga 'is yid du 'ong zhing/ yid du mi 'ong ba ma yin padang/ byams pa'i yid kyi las yid du 'ong zhange/ mde du mi 'ong ba ma yin pas yongs su spyad do// de bas na kun dga' bong da lta lus 'adeganas

shing 'tsho skyong ban/ gang khyod kyis byams padaga' ba dang bla marabyas pa de nga 'das pa'i 'og tu khyod kyis shes 'bakyi pha rol tu phyin pa gat+tale byi shagi/ kun ngaga' bo khyod la lan kachas lan gsum du gtad cing rjes su

gtad kyis/ khyod kyis tsazhas kyang shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ma gyur bar gyis shig/ kun dga' bo dza srid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'a'ajig rteshan gnas pa de sridadu/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang bshu par rig pa bya

desrid du de bzhin gshegs pa tshos 'chad par rig par bya'o// kun dga' bosems shagang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ang te'abadang/ 'dzan pa dang/ 'chung ba dang/ klog pa dang/ kun chub par byed pa dang/ sgrogs ba

dang/ ston pa dang/ kha na byed pa dang/ 'dra ba dang rim gro byed pa dang/ bla mar byed pa dang/ bstastang du byed pa dang/ mchod par byed pa dang/ rjed par byed pa dang/ gus par byed cing ma tog dang/ bdug padang/
bya// spos dang/ 'breng ba dang/ byag pa dang/ gosadang/ phye mdang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ bangan dang/ kho ra khor yug tu mngaleb 'phreng ba rnam pasna tshogs kyis
kamanod pas mchod par byed pa'i sams can de dag ni sangos rgyus mthong ba dang mi 'bral/ chos nyan pa dang mi 'bral bar rig par bya'o// kun dga' bo sems can de dga' de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs
'brang zha' khodo bar rig par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das thugs dgyes pas de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ tshodang ldan pa rab 'byor dang/ tshod ldan pa shA ra dwa tshwa'i budang tshe dang ldan pa mo'u

'gal gyi bu chen pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po dang/ tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa ka t+yA ya na chen podang/ tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa rib ta
[“]dang/ tshe dang ldan pa ra hu la dang/ 'khor rnam bzhidang/ lhadang/ ma dang/ lha ma yan du bcas pa'i'ajig rten pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal b.latshangon par dwaga' bar gyur te/ mos bar
gyur to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyangelcab las/ yongs sugatad pa'i lo'u ste bdun cu drug pa'o/// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag shulngal/ phyogs bcu mtha'
